45 CTurbSolver::CTurbSolver(CGeometry* geometry, CConfig *config) : CSolver() {

88 void CTurbSolver::Upwind_Residual(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) {
89 
90  su2double *Turb_i, *Turb_j, *Limiter_i = NULL, *Limiter_j = NULL, *V_i, *V_j, **Gradient_i, **Gradient_j, Project_Grad_i, Project_Grad_j;
91  unsigned long iEdge, iPoint, jPoint;
92  unsigned short iDim, iVar;
93 
94  bool muscl = config->GetMUSCL_Turb();
95  bool limiter = (config->GetKind_SlopeLimit_Turb() != NO_LIMITER);
96 
97  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
98 
99  /*--- Points in edge and normal vectors ---*/
100 
101  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
102  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
103  numerics->SetNormal(geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNormal());
104 
105  /*--- Primitive variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
106 
107  V_i = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint);
108  V_j = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(jPoint);
109  numerics->SetPrimitive(V_i, V_j);
110 
111  /*--- Turbulent variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
112 
113  Turb_i = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint);
114  Turb_j = nodes->GetSolution(jPoint);
115  numerics->SetTurbVar(Turb_i, Turb_j);
116 
117  /*--- Grid Movement ---*/
118 
119  if (dynamic_grid)
120  numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(), geometry->node[jPoint]->GetGridVel());
121 
122  if (muscl) {
123 
124  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
125  Vector_i[iDim] = 0.5*(geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord(iDim) - geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim));
126  Vector_j[iDim] = 0.5*(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim) - geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord(iDim));
127  }
128 
129  /*--- Mean flow primitive variables using gradient reconstruction and limiters ---*/
130 
131  Gradient_i = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetGradient_Reconstruction(iPoint);
132  Gradient_j = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetGradient_Reconstruction(jPoint);
133 
134  if (limiter) {
135  Limiter_i = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetLimiter_Primitive(iPoint);
136  Limiter_j = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetLimiter_Primitive(jPoint);
137  }
138 
139  for (iVar = 0; iVar < solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetnPrimVarGrad(); iVar++) {
140  Project_Grad_i = 0.0; Project_Grad_j = 0.0;
141  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
142  Project_Grad_i += Vector_i[iDim]*Gradient_i[iVar][iDim];
143  Project_Grad_j += Vector_j[iDim]*Gradient_j[iVar][iDim];
144  }
145  if (limiter) {
146  FlowPrimVar_i[iVar] = V_i[iVar] + Limiter_i[iVar]*Project_Grad_i;
147  FlowPrimVar_j[iVar] = V_j[iVar] + Limiter_j[iVar]*Project_Grad_j;
148  }
149  else {
150  FlowPrimVar_i[iVar] = V_i[iVar] + Project_Grad_i;
151  FlowPrimVar_j[iVar] = V_j[iVar] + Project_Grad_j;
152  }
153  }
154 
155  numerics->SetPrimitive(FlowPrimVar_i, FlowPrimVar_j);
156 
157  /*--- Turbulent variables using gradient reconstruction and limiters ---*/
158 
159  Gradient_i = nodes->GetGradient_Reconstruction(iPoint);
160  Gradient_j = nodes->GetGradient_Reconstruction(jPoint);
161 
162  if (limiter) {
163  Limiter_i = nodes->GetLimiter(iPoint);
164  Limiter_j = nodes->GetLimiter(jPoint);
165  }
166 
167  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
168  Project_Grad_i = 0.0; Project_Grad_j = 0.0;
169  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
170  Project_Grad_i += Vector_i[iDim]*Gradient_i[iVar][iDim];
171  Project_Grad_j += Vector_j[iDim]*Gradient_j[iVar][iDim];
172  }
173  if (limiter) {
174  Solution_i[iVar] = Turb_i[iVar] + Limiter_i[iVar]*Project_Grad_i;
175  Solution_j[iVar] = Turb_j[iVar] + Limiter_j[iVar]*Project_Grad_j;
176  }
177  else {
178  Solution_i[iVar] = Turb_i[iVar] + Project_Grad_i;
179  Solution_j[iVar] = Turb_j[iVar] + Project_Grad_j;
180  }
181  }
182 
183  numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
184 
185  }
186 
187  /*--- Add and subtract residual ---*/
188 
189  numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
190 
191  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
192  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(jPoint, Residual);
193 
194  /*--- Implicit part ---*/
195 
196  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
197  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, jPoint, Jacobian_j);
198  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(jPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
199  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(jPoint, jPoint, Jacobian_j);
200 
201  }
202 
203 }

205 void CTurbSolver::Viscous_Residual(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics,
206  CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh, unsigned short iRKStep) {
207  unsigned long iEdge, iPoint, jPoint;
208 
209  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
210 
211  /*--- Points in edge ---*/
212 
213  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
214  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
215 
216  /*--- Points coordinates, and normal vector ---*/
217 
218  numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(),
219  geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord());
220  numerics->SetNormal(geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNormal());
221 
222  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
223 
224  numerics->SetPrimitive(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint),
225  solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(jPoint));
226 
227  /*--- Turbulent variables w/o reconstruction, and its gradients ---*/
228 
229  numerics->SetTurbVar(nodes->GetSolution(iPoint), nodes->GetSolution(jPoint));
230  numerics->SetTurbVarGradient(nodes->GetGradient(iPoint), nodes->GetGradient(jPoint));
231 
232  /*--- Menter's first blending function (only SST)---*/
233  if ((config->GetKind_Turb_Model() == SST) || (config->GetKind_Turb_Model() == SST_SUST))
234  numerics->SetF1blending(nodes->GetF1blending(iPoint), nodes->GetF1blending(jPoint));
235 
236  /*--- Compute residual, and Jacobians ---*/
237 
238  numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
239 
240  /*--- Add and subtract residual, and update Jacobians ---*/
241 
242  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual);
243  LinSysRes.AddBlock(jPoint, Residual);
244 
245  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
246  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, jPoint, Jacobian_j);
247  Jacobian.AddBlock(jPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
248  Jacobian.AddBlock(jPoint, jPoint, Jacobian_j);
249 
250  }

331 void CTurbSolver::BC_Periodic(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container,
332  CNumerics *numerics, CConfig *config) {
333 
334  /*--- Complete residuals for periodic boundary conditions. We loop over
335  the periodic BCs in matching pairs so that, in the event that there are
336  adjacent periodic markers, the repeated points will have their residuals
337  accumulated corectly during the communications. For implicit calculations
338  the Jacobians and linear system are also correctly adjusted here. ---*/
339 
340  for (unsigned short iPeriodic = 1; iPeriodic <= config->GetnMarker_Periodic()/2; iPeriodic++) {
341  InitiatePeriodicComms(geometry, config, iPeriodic, PERIODIC_RESIDUAL);
342  CompletePeriodicComms(geometry, config, iPeriodic, PERIODIC_RESIDUAL);
343  }

347 void CTurbSolver::ImplicitEuler_Iteration(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config) {
348 
349  unsigned short iVar;
350  unsigned long iPoint, total_index;
351  su2double Delta, Vol, density_old = 0.0, density = 0.0;
352 
353  bool adjoint = config->GetContinuous_Adjoint() || (config->GetDiscrete_Adjoint() && config->GetFrozen_Visc_Disc());
354  bool compressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == COMPRESSIBLE);
355  bool incompressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == INCOMPRESSIBLE);
356 
357  /*--- Set maximum residual to zero ---*/
358 
359  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
360  SetRes_RMS(iVar, 0.0);
361  SetRes_Max(iVar, 0.0, 0);
362  }
363 
364  /*--- Build implicit system ---*/
365 
366  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
367 
368  /*--- Read the volume ---*/
369 
370  Vol = (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume() +
371  geometry->node[iPoint]->GetPeriodicVolume());
372 
373  /*--- Modify matrix diagonal to assure diagonal dominance ---*/
374 
375  Delta = Vol / ((nodes->GetLocalCFL(iPoint)/solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetLocalCFL(iPoint))*solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDelta_Time(iPoint));
376  Jacobian.AddVal2Diag(iPoint, Delta);
377 
378  /*--- Right hand side of the system (-Residual) and initial guess (x = 0) ---*/
379 
380  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
381  total_index = iPoint*nVar+iVar;
382  LinSysRes[total_index] = - LinSysRes[total_index];
383  LinSysSol[total_index] = 0.0;
384  AddRes_RMS(iVar, LinSysRes[total_index]*LinSysRes[total_index]);
385  AddRes_Max(iVar, fabs(LinSysRes[total_index]), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord());
386  }
387  }
388 
389  /*--- Initialize residual and solution at the ghost points ---*/
390 
391  for (iPoint = nPointDomain; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
392  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
393  total_index = iPoint*nVar + iVar;
394  LinSysRes[total_index] = 0.0;
395  LinSysSol[total_index] = 0.0;
396  }
397  }
398 
399  /*--- Solve or smooth the linear system ---*/
400 
401  unsigned long IterLinSol = System.Solve(Jacobian, LinSysRes, LinSysSol, geometry, config);
402  SetIterLinSolver(IterLinSol);
403 
404  /*--- Store the value of the residual. ---*/
405 
406  SetResLinSolver(System.GetResidual());
407 
408  ComputeUnderRelaxationFactor(solver_container, config);
409 
410  /*--- Update solution (system written in terms of increments) ---*/
411 
412  if (!adjoint) {
413 
414  /*--- Update the turbulent solution. Only SST variants are clipped. ---*/
415 
416  switch (config->GetKind_Turb_Model()) {
417 
418  case SA: case SA_E: case SA_COMP: case SA_E_COMP: case SA_NEG:
419 
420  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
421  nodes->AddSolution(iPoint, 0, nodes->GetUnderRelaxation(iPoint)*LinSysSol[iPoint]);
422  }
423 
424  break;
425 
426  case SST: case SST_SUST:
427 
428  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
429 
430  if (compressible) {
431  density_old = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetSolution_Old(iPoint,0);
432  density = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(iPoint);
433  }
434  if (incompressible) {
435  density_old = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(iPoint);
436  density = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(iPoint);
437  }
438 
439  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
440  nodes->AddConservativeSolution(iPoint, iVar, nodes->GetUnderRelaxation(iPoint)*LinSysSol[iPoint*nVar+iVar], density, density_old, lowerlimit[iVar], upperlimit[iVar]);
441  }
442 
443  }
444 
445  break;
446 
447  }
448  }
449 
450  for (unsigned short iPeriodic = 1; iPeriodic <= config->GetnMarker_Periodic()/2; iPeriodic++) {
451  InitiatePeriodicComms(geometry, config, iPeriodic, PERIODIC_IMPLICIT);
452  CompletePeriodicComms(geometry, config, iPeriodic, PERIODIC_IMPLICIT);
453  }
454 
455  /*--- MPI solution ---*/
456 
457  InitiateComms(geometry, config, SOLUTION_EDDY);
458  CompleteComms(geometry, config, SOLUTION_EDDY);
459 
460  /*--- Compute the root mean square residual ---*/
461 
462  SetResidual_RMS(geometry, config);
463 
464 }
465 
466 void CTurbSolver::ComputeUnderRelaxationFactor(CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config) {
467 
468  /* Only apply the turbulent under-relaxation to the SA variants. The
469  SA_NEG model is more robust due to allowing for negative nu_tilde,
470  so the under-relaxation is not applied to that variant. */
471 
472  bool sa_model = ((config->GetKind_Turb_Model() == SA) ||
473  (config->GetKind_Turb_Model() == SA_E) ||
474  (config->GetKind_Turb_Model() == SA_COMP) ||
475  (config->GetKind_Turb_Model() == SA_E_COMP));
476 
477  /* Loop over the solution update given by relaxing the linear
478  system for this nonlinear iteration. */
479 
480  su2double localUnderRelaxation = 1.00;
481  const su2double allowableDecrease = -0.99;
482  const su2double allowableIncrease = 0.99;
483 
484  for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
485 
486  localUnderRelaxation = 1.0;
487  if (sa_model) {
488  for (unsigned short iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
489 
490  /* We impose a limit on the maximum percentage that the
491  turbulence variables can change over a nonlinear iteration. */
492 
493  const unsigned long index = iPoint*nVar + iVar;
494  su2double ratio = LinSysSol[index]/(nodes->GetSolution(iPoint, iVar)+EPS);
495  if (ratio > allowableIncrease) {
496  localUnderRelaxation = min(allowableIncrease/ratio, localUnderRelaxation);
497  } else if (ratio < allowableDecrease) {
498  localUnderRelaxation = min(fabs(allowableDecrease)/ratio, localUnderRelaxation);
499  }
500 
501  }
502  }
503 
504  /* Choose the minimum factor between mean flow and turbulence. */
505 
506  localUnderRelaxation = min(localUnderRelaxation, solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetUnderRelaxation(iPoint));
507 
508  /* Threshold the relaxation factor in the event that there is
509  a very small value. This helps avoid catastrophic crashes due
510  to non-realizable states by canceling the update. */
511 
512  if (localUnderRelaxation < 1e-10) localUnderRelaxation = 0.0;
513 
514  /* Store the under-relaxation factor for this point. */
515 
516  nodes->SetUnderRelaxation(iPoint, localUnderRelaxation);
517 
518  }
519 
520 }
521 
522 void CTurbSolver::SetResidual_DualTime(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config,
523  unsigned short iRKStep, unsigned short iMesh, unsigned short RunTime_EqSystem) {
524 
525  /*--- Local variables ---*/
526 
527  unsigned short iVar, jVar, iMarker, iDim;
528  unsigned long iPoint, jPoint, iEdge, iVertex;
529 
530  su2double *U_time_nM1, *U_time_n, *U_time_nP1;
531  su2double Volume_nM1, Volume_nP1, TimeStep;
532  su2double Density_nM1, Density_n, Density_nP1;
533  su2double *Normal = NULL, *GridVel_i = NULL, *GridVel_j = NULL, Residual_GCL;
534 
535  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_Turb() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
536 
537  bool incompressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == INCOMPRESSIBLE);
538  unsigned short turbModel = config->GetKind_Turb_Model();
539 
540  /*--- Store the physical time step ---*/
541 
542  TimeStep = config->GetDelta_UnstTimeND();
543 
544  /*--- Compute the dual time-stepping source term for static meshes ---*/
545 
546  if (!dynamic_grid) {
547 
548  /*--- Loop over all nodes (excluding halos) ---*/
549 
550  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
551 
552  /*--- Retrieve the solution at time levels n-1, n, and n+1. Note that
553  we are currently iterating on U^n+1 and that U^n & U^n-1 are fixed,
554  previous solutions that are stored in memory. ---*/
555 
556  U_time_nM1 = nodes->GetSolution_time_n1(iPoint);
557  U_time_n = nodes->GetSolution_time_n(iPoint);
558  U_time_nP1 = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint);
559 
560  /*--- CV volume at time n+1. As we are on a static mesh, the volume
561  of the CV will remained fixed for all time steps. ---*/
562 
563  Volume_nP1 = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
564 
565  /*--- Compute the dual time-stepping source term based on the chosen
566  time discretization scheme (1st- or 2nd-order).---*/
567 
568  if ((turbModel == SST) || (turbModel == SST_SUST)) {
569 
570  /*--- If this is the SST model, we need to multiply by the density
571  in order to get the conservative variables ---*/
572  if (incompressible){
573  /*--- This is temporary and only valid for constant-density problems:
574  density could also be temperature dependent, but as it is not a part
575  of the solution vector it's neither stored for previous time steps
576  nor updated with the solution at the end of each iteration. */
577  Density_nM1 = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(iPoint);
578  Density_n = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(iPoint);
579  Density_nP1 = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(iPoint);
580  }
581  else{
582  Density_nM1 = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetSolution_time_n1(iPoint)[0];
583  Density_n = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetSolution_time_n(iPoint,0);
584  Density_nP1 = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetSolution(iPoint,0);
585  }
586 
587  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
588  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == DT_STEPPING_1ST)
589  Residual[iVar] = ( Density_nP1*U_time_nP1[iVar] - Density_n*U_time_n[iVar])*Volume_nP1 / TimeStep;
590  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == DT_STEPPING_2ND)
591  Residual[iVar] = ( 3.0*Density_nP1*U_time_nP1[iVar] - 4.0*Density_n*U_time_n[iVar]
592  +1.0*Density_nM1*U_time_nM1[iVar])*Volume_nP1 / (2.0*TimeStep);
593  }
594 
595  } else {
596 
597  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
598  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == DT_STEPPING_1ST)
599  Residual[iVar] = (U_time_nP1[iVar] - U_time_n[iVar])*Volume_nP1 / TimeStep;
600  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == DT_STEPPING_2ND)
601  Residual[iVar] = ( 3.0*U_time_nP1[iVar] - 4.0*U_time_n[iVar]
602  +1.0*U_time_nM1[iVar])*Volume_nP1 / (2.0*TimeStep);
603  }
604  }
605 
606  /*--- Store the residual and compute the Jacobian contribution due
607  to the dual time source term. ---*/
608 
609  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
610  if (implicit) {
611  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
612  for (jVar = 0; jVar < nVar; jVar++) Jacobian_i[iVar][jVar] = 0.0;
613  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == DT_STEPPING_1ST)
614  Jacobian_i[iVar][iVar] = Volume_nP1 / TimeStep;
615  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == DT_STEPPING_2ND)
616  Jacobian_i[iVar][iVar] = (Volume_nP1*3.0)/(2.0*TimeStep);
617  }
618  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
619  }
620  }
621 
622  } else {
623 
624  /*--- For unsteady flows on dynamic meshes (rigidly transforming or
625  dynamically deforming), the Geometric Conservation Law (GCL) should be
626  satisfied in conjunction with the ALE formulation of the governing
627  equations. The GCL prevents accuracy issues caused by grid motion, i.e.
628  a uniform free-stream should be preserved through a moving grid. First,
629  we will loop over the edges and boundaries to compute the GCL component
630  of the dual time source term that depends on grid velocities. ---*/
631 
632  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
633 
634  /*--- Get indices for nodes i & j plus the face normal ---*/
635 
636  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
637  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
638  Normal = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNormal();
639 
640  /*--- Grid velocities stored at nodes i & j ---*/
641 
642  GridVel_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
643  GridVel_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetGridVel();
644 
645  /*--- Compute the GCL term by averaging the grid velocities at the
646  edge mid-point and dotting with the face normal. ---*/
647 
648  Residual_GCL = 0.0;
649  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
650  Residual_GCL += 0.5*(GridVel_i[iDim]+GridVel_j[iDim])*Normal[iDim];
651 
652  /*--- Compute the GCL component of the source term for node i ---*/
653 
654  U_time_n = nodes->GetSolution_time_n(iPoint);
655 
656  /*--- Multiply by density at node i for the SST model ---*/
657 
658  if ((turbModel == SST) || (turbModel == SST_SUST)) {
659  if (incompressible) Density_n = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(iPoint); // Temporary fix
660  else Density_n = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetSolution_time_n(iPoint,0);
661  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
662  Residual[iVar] = Density_n*U_time_n[iVar]*Residual_GCL;
663  } else {
664  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
665  Residual[iVar] = U_time_n[iVar]*Residual_GCL;
666  }
667  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
668 
669  /*--- Compute the GCL component of the source term for node j ---*/
670 
671  U_time_n = nodes->GetSolution_time_n(jPoint);
672 
673  /*--- Multiply by density at node j for the SST model ---*/
674 
675  if ((turbModel == SST) || (turbModel == SST_SUST)) {
676  if (incompressible) Density_n = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(jPoint); // Temporary fix
677  else Density_n = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetSolution_time_n(jPoint)[0];
678  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
679  Residual[iVar] = Density_n*U_time_n[iVar]*Residual_GCL;
680  } else {
681  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
682  Residual[iVar] = U_time_n[iVar]*Residual_GCL;
683  }
684  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(jPoint, Residual);
685 
686  }
687 
688  /*--- Loop over the boundary edges ---*/
689 
690  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < geometry->GetnMarker(); iMarker++) {
691  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERNAL_BOUNDARY) &&
692  (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)) {
693  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->GetnVertex(iMarker); iVertex++) {
694 
695  /*--- Get the index for node i plus the boundary face normal ---*/
696 
697  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
698  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
699 
700  /*--- Grid velocities stored at boundary node i ---*/
701 
702  GridVel_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
703 
704  /*--- Compute the GCL term by dotting the grid velocity with the face
705  normal. The normal is negated to match the boundary convention. ---*/
706 
707  Residual_GCL = 0.0;
708  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
709  Residual_GCL -= 0.5*(GridVel_i[iDim]+GridVel_i[iDim])*Normal[iDim];
710 
711  /*--- Compute the GCL component of the source term for node i ---*/
712 
713  U_time_n = nodes->GetSolution_time_n(iPoint);
714 
715  /*--- Multiply by density at node i for the SST model ---*/
716 
717  if ((turbModel == SST) || (turbModel == SST_SUST)) {
718  if (incompressible) Density_n = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(iPoint); // Temporary fix
719  else Density_n = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetSolution_time_n(iPoint,0);
720  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
721  Residual[iVar] = Density_n*U_time_n[iVar]*Residual_GCL;
722  } else {
723  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
724  Residual[iVar] = U_time_n[iVar]*Residual_GCL;
725  }
726  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
727 
728  }
729  }
730  }
731 
732  /*--- Loop over all nodes (excluding halos) to compute the remainder
733  of the dual time-stepping source term. ---*/
734 
735  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
736 
737  /*--- Retrieve the solution at time levels n-1, n, and n+1. Note that
738  we are currently iterating on U^n+1 and that U^n & U^n-1 are fixed,
739  previous solutions that are stored in memory. ---*/
740 
741  U_time_nM1 = nodes->GetSolution_time_n1(iPoint);
742  U_time_n = nodes->GetSolution_time_n(iPoint);
743  U_time_nP1 = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint);
744 
745  /*--- CV volume at time n-1 and n+1. In the case of dynamically deforming
746  grids, the volumes will change. On rigidly transforming grids, the
747  volumes will remain constant. ---*/
748 
749  Volume_nM1 = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume_nM1();
750  Volume_nP1 = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
751 
752  /*--- Compute the dual time-stepping source residual. Due to the
753  introduction of the GCL term above, the remainder of the source residual
754  due to the time discretization has a new form.---*/
755 
756  if ((turbModel == SST) || (turbModel == SST_SUST)) {
757 
758  /*--- If this is the SST model, we need to multiply by the density
759  in order to get the conservative variables ---*/
760  if (incompressible){
761  /*--- This is temporary and only valid for constant-density problems:
762  density could also be temperature dependent, but as it is not a part
763  of the solution vector it's neither stored for previous time steps
764  nor updated with the solution at the end of each iteration. */
765  Density_nM1 = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(iPoint);
766  Density_n = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(iPoint);
767  Density_nP1 = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(iPoint);
768  }
769  else{
770  Density_nM1 = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetSolution_time_n1(iPoint)[0];
771  Density_n = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetSolution_time_n(iPoint,0);
772  Density_nP1 = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetSolution(iPoint,0);
773  }
774 
775  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
776  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == DT_STEPPING_1ST)
777  Residual[iVar] = (Density_nP1*U_time_nP1[iVar] - Density_n*U_time_n[iVar])*(Volume_nP1/TimeStep);
778  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == DT_STEPPING_2ND)
779  Residual[iVar] = (Density_nP1*U_time_nP1[iVar] - Density_n*U_time_n[iVar])*(3.0*Volume_nP1/(2.0*TimeStep))
780  + (Density_nM1*U_time_nM1[iVar] - Density_n*U_time_n[iVar])*(Volume_nM1/(2.0*TimeStep));
781  }
782 
783  } else {
784 
785  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
786  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == DT_STEPPING_1ST)
787  Residual[iVar] = (U_time_nP1[iVar] - U_time_n[iVar])*(Volume_nP1/TimeStep);
788  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == DT_STEPPING_2ND)
789  Residual[iVar] = (U_time_nP1[iVar] - U_time_n[iVar])*(3.0*Volume_nP1/(2.0*TimeStep))
790  + (U_time_nM1[iVar] - U_time_n[iVar])*(Volume_nM1/(2.0*TimeStep));
791  }
792  }
793 
794  /*--- Store the residual and compute the Jacobian contribution due
795  to the dual time source term. ---*/
796 
797  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
798  if (implicit) {
799  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
800  for (jVar = 0; jVar < nVar; jVar++) Jacobian_i[iVar][jVar] = 0.0;
801  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == DT_STEPPING_1ST)
802  Jacobian_i[iVar][iVar] = Volume_nP1/TimeStep;
803  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == DT_STEPPING_2ND)
804  Jacobian_i[iVar][iVar] = (3.0*Volume_nP1)/(2.0*TimeStep);
805  }
806  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
807  }
808  }
809  }
810 
811 }
812 
813 
814 void CTurbSolver::LoadRestart(CGeometry **geometry, CSolver ***solver, CConfig *config, int val_iter, bool val_update_geo) {
815 
816  /*--- Restart the solution from file information ---*/
817 
818  unsigned short iVar, iMesh;
819  unsigned long iPoint, index, iChildren, Point_Fine;
820  su2double Area_Children, Area_Parent, *Solution_Fine;
821 
822  string restart_filename = config->GetFilename(config->GetSolution_FileName(), "", val_iter);
823  /*--- Read the restart data from either an ASCII or binary SU2 file. ---*/
824 
825  if (config->GetRead_Binary_Restart()) {
826  Read_SU2_Restart_Binary(geometry[MESH_0], config, restart_filename);
827  } else {
828  Read_SU2_Restart_ASCII(geometry[MESH_0], config, restart_filename);
829  }
830 
831  int counter = 0;
832  long iPoint_Local = 0; unsigned long iPoint_Global = 0;
833  unsigned long iPoint_Global_Local = 0;
834  unsigned short rbuf_NotMatching = 0, sbuf_NotMatching = 0;
835 
836  /*--- Skip flow variables ---*/
837 
838  unsigned short skipVars = 0;
839 
840  if (nDim == 2) skipVars += 6;
841  if (nDim == 3) skipVars += 8;
842 
843  /*--- Adjust the number of solution variables in the incompressible
844  restart. We always carry a space in nVar for the energy equation in the
845  mean flow solver, but we only write it to the restart if it is active.
846  Therefore, we must reduce skipVars here if energy is inactive so that
847  the turbulent variables are read correctly. ---*/
848 
849  bool incompressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == INCOMPRESSIBLE);
850  bool energy = config->GetEnergy_Equation();
851  bool weakly_coupled_heat = config->GetWeakly_Coupled_Heat();
852 
853  if (incompressible && ((!energy) && (!weakly_coupled_heat))) skipVars--;
854 
855  /*--- Load data from the restart into correct containers. ---*/
856 
857  counter = 0;
858  for (iPoint_Global = 0; iPoint_Global < geometry[MESH_0]->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint_Global++ ) {
859 
860 
861  /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
862  on the current processor, we will load and instantiate the vars. ---*/
863 
864  iPoint_Local = geometry[MESH_0]->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
865 
866  if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
867 
868  /*--- We need to store this point's data, so jump to the correct
869  offset in the buffer of data from the restart file and load it. ---*/
870 
871  index = counter*Restart_Vars[1] + skipVars;
872  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Solution[iVar] = Restart_Data[index+iVar];
873  nodes->SetSolution(iPoint_Local,Solution);
874  iPoint_Global_Local++;
875 
876  /*--- Increment the overall counter for how many points have been loaded. ---*/
877  counter++;
878  }
879 
880  }
881 
882  /*--- Detect a wrong solution file ---*/
883 
884  if (iPoint_Global_Local < nPointDomain) { sbuf_NotMatching = 1; }
885 
886 #ifndef HAVE_MPI
887  rbuf_NotMatching = sbuf_NotMatching;
888 #else
889  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&sbuf_NotMatching, &rbuf_NotMatching, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
890 #endif
891  if (rbuf_NotMatching != 0) {
892  SU2_MPI::Error(string("The solution file ") + restart_filename + string(" doesn't match with the mesh file!\n") +
893  string("It could be empty lines at the end of the file."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
894  }
895 
896  /*--- MPI solution and compute the eddy viscosity ---*/
897 
898  solver[MESH_0][TURB_SOL]->InitiateComms(geometry[MESH_0], config, SOLUTION_EDDY);
899  solver[MESH_0][TURB_SOL]->CompleteComms(geometry[MESH_0], config, SOLUTION_EDDY);
900 
901  solver[MESH_0][FLOW_SOL]->Preprocessing(geometry[MESH_0], solver[MESH_0], config, MESH_0, NO_RK_ITER, RUNTIME_FLOW_SYS, false);
902  solver[MESH_0][TURB_SOL]->Postprocessing(geometry[MESH_0], solver[MESH_0], config, MESH_0);
903 
904  /*--- Interpolate the solution down to the coarse multigrid levels ---*/
905 
906  for (iMesh = 1; iMesh <= config->GetnMGLevels(); iMesh++) {
907  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry[iMesh]->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
908  Area_Parent = geometry[iMesh]->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
909  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Solution[iVar] = 0.0;
910  for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < geometry[iMesh]->node[iPoint]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren++) {
911  Point_Fine = geometry[iMesh]->node[iPoint]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
912  Area_Children = geometry[iMesh-1]->node[Point_Fine]->GetVolume();
913  Solution_Fine = solver[iMesh-1][TURB_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetSolution(Point_Fine);
914  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
915  Solution[iVar] += Solution_Fine[iVar]*Area_Children/Area_Parent;
916  }
917  }
918  solver[iMesh][TURB_SOL]->GetNodes()->SetSolution(iPoint,Solution);
919  }
920  solver[iMesh][TURB_SOL]->InitiateComms(geometry[iMesh], config, SOLUTION_EDDY);
921  solver[iMesh][TURB_SOL]->CompleteComms(geometry[iMesh], config, SOLUTION_EDDY);
922  solver[iMesh][FLOW_SOL]->Preprocessing(geometry[iMesh], solver[iMesh], config, iMesh, NO_RK_ITER, RUNTIME_FLOW_SYS, false);
923  solver[iMesh][TURB_SOL]->Postprocessing(geometry[iMesh], solver[iMesh], config, iMesh);
924  }
925 
926  /*--- Delete the class memory that is used to load the restart. ---*/
927 
928  if (Restart_Vars != NULL) delete [] Restart_Vars;
929  if (Restart_Data != NULL) delete [] Restart_Data;
930  Restart_Vars = NULL; Restart_Data = NULL;
931 
932 }
933 
934 CTurbSASolver::CTurbSASolver(void) : CTurbSolver() {
935 
936  Inlet_TurbVars = NULL;
937 
938 }
939 
940 CTurbSASolver::CTurbSASolver(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh, CFluidModel* FluidModel)
941  : CTurbSolver(geometry, config) {
942  unsigned short iVar, iDim, nLineLets;
943  unsigned long iPoint;
944  su2double Density_Inf, Viscosity_Inf, Factor_nu_Inf, Factor_nu_Engine, Factor_nu_ActDisk;
945 
946  bool multizone = config->GetMultizone_Problem();
947 
948  Gamma = config->GetGamma();
949  Gamma_Minus_One = Gamma - 1.0;
950 
951  /*--- Dimension of the problem --> dependent of the turbulent model ---*/
952 
953  nVar = 1;
954  nPrimVar = 1;
955  nPoint = geometry->GetnPoint();
956  nPointDomain = geometry->GetnPointDomain();
957 
958  /*--- Initialize nVarGrad for deallocation ---*/
959 
960  nVarGrad = nVar;
961 
962  /*--- Define geometry constants in the solver structure ---*/
963 
964  nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
965 
966  /*--- Single grid simulation ---*/
967 
968  if (iMesh == MESH_0 || config->GetMGCycle() == FULLMG_CYCLE) {
969 
970  /*--- Define some auxiliar vector related with the residual ---*/
971 
972  Residual = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual[iVar] = 0.0;
973  Residual_RMS = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_RMS[iVar] = 0.0;
974  Residual_i = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_i[iVar] = 0.0;
975  Residual_j = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_j[iVar] = 0.0;
976  Residual_Max = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_Max[iVar] = 0.0;
977 
978  /*--- Define some structures for locating max residuals ---*/
979 
980  Point_Max = new unsigned long[nVar];
981  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Point_Max[iVar] = 0;
982  Point_Max_Coord = new su2double*[nVar];
983  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
984  Point_Max_Coord[iVar] = new su2double[nDim];
985  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Point_Max_Coord[iVar][iDim] = 0.0;
986  }
987 
988  /*--- Define some auxiliar vector related with the solution ---*/
989 
990  Solution = new su2double[nVar];
991  Solution_i = new su2double[nVar]; Solution_j = new su2double[nVar];
992 
993  /*--- Define some auxiliar vector related with the geometry ---*/
994 
995  Vector_i = new su2double[nDim]; Vector_j = new su2double[nDim];
996 
997  /*--- Define some auxiliar vector related with the flow solution ---*/
998 
999  FlowPrimVar_i = new su2double [nDim+9]; FlowPrimVar_j = new su2double [nDim+9];
1000 
1001  /*--- Jacobians and vector structures for implicit computations ---*/
1002 
1003  Jacobian_i = new su2double* [nVar];
1004  Jacobian_j = new su2double* [nVar];
1005  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
1006  Jacobian_i[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
1007  Jacobian_j[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
1008  }
1009 
1010  /*--- Initialization of the structure of the whole Jacobian ---*/
1011 
1012  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Initialize Jacobian structure (SA model)." << endl;
1013  Jacobian.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nVar, nVar, true, geometry, config);
1014 
1015  if (config->GetKind_Linear_Solver_Prec() == LINELET) {
1016  nLineLets = Jacobian.BuildLineletPreconditioner(geometry, config);
1017  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Compute linelet structure. " << nLineLets << " elements in each line (average)." << endl;
1018  }
1019 
1020  LinSysSol.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nVar, 0.0);
1021  LinSysRes.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nVar, 0.0);
1022 
1023  if (config->GetExtraOutput()) {
1024  if (nDim == 2) { nOutputVariables = 13; }
1025  else if (nDim == 3) { nOutputVariables = 19; }
1026  OutputVariables.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nOutputVariables, 0.0);
1027  OutputHeadingNames = new string[nOutputVariables];
1028  }
1029 
1030  /*--- Computation of gradients by least squares ---*/
1031 
1032  if (config->GetLeastSquaresRequired()) {
1033  /*--- S matrix := inv(R)*traspose(inv(R)) ---*/
1034  Smatrix = new su2double* [nDim];
1035  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
1036  Smatrix[iDim] = new su2double [nDim];
1037 
1038  /*--- c vector := transpose(WA)*(Wb) ---*/
1039  Cvector = new su2double* [nVar];
1040  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1041  Cvector[iVar] = new su2double [nDim];
1042  }
1043 
1044  /*--- Initialize the BGS residuals in multizone problems. ---*/
1045  if (multizone){
1046  Residual_BGS = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_BGS[iVar] = 0.0;
1047  Residual_Max_BGS = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_Max_BGS[iVar] = 0.0;
1048 
1049  /*--- Define some structures for locating max residuals ---*/
1050 
1051  Point_Max_BGS = new unsigned long[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Point_Max_BGS[iVar] = 0;
1052  Point_Max_Coord_BGS = new su2double*[nVar];
1053  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
1054  Point_Max_Coord_BGS[iVar] = new su2double[nDim];
1055  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Point_Max_Coord_BGS[iVar][iDim] = 0.0;
1056  }
1057  }
1058 
1059  }
1060 
1061  /*--- Read farfield conditions from config ---*/
1062 
1063  Density_Inf = config->GetDensity_FreeStreamND();
1064  Viscosity_Inf = config->GetViscosity_FreeStreamND();
1065 
1066  /*--- Factor_nu_Inf in [3.0, 5.0] ---*/
1067 
1068  Factor_nu_Inf = config->GetNuFactor_FreeStream();
1069  nu_tilde_Inf = Factor_nu_Inf*Viscosity_Inf/Density_Inf;
1070  if (config->GetKind_Trans_Model() == BC) {
1071  nu_tilde_Inf = 0.005*Factor_nu_Inf*Viscosity_Inf/Density_Inf;
1072  }
1073 
1074  /*--- Factor_nu_Engine ---*/
1075  Factor_nu_Engine = config->GetNuFactor_Engine();
1076  nu_tilde_Engine = Factor_nu_Engine*Viscosity_Inf/Density_Inf;
1077  if (config->GetKind_Trans_Model() == BC) {
1078  nu_tilde_Engine = 0.005*Factor_nu_Engine*Viscosity_Inf/Density_Inf;
1079  }
1080 
1081  /*--- Factor_nu_ActDisk ---*/
1082  Factor_nu_ActDisk = config->GetNuFactor_Engine();
1083  nu_tilde_ActDisk = Factor_nu_ActDisk*Viscosity_Inf/Density_Inf;
1084 
1085  /*--- Eddy viscosity at infinity ---*/
1086  su2double Ji, Ji_3, fv1, cv1_3 = 7.1*7.1*7.1;
1087  su2double muT_Inf;
1088  Ji = nu_tilde_Inf/Viscosity_Inf*Density_Inf;
1089  Ji_3 = Ji*Ji*Ji;
1090  fv1 = Ji_3/(Ji_3+cv1_3);
1091  muT_Inf = Density_Inf*fv1*nu_tilde_Inf;
1092 
1093  /*--- Initialize the solution to the far-field state everywhere. ---*/
1094 
1095  nodes = new CTurbSAVariable(nu_tilde_Inf, muT_Inf, nPoint, nDim, nVar, config);
1096  SetBaseClassPointerToNodes();
1097 
1098  /*--- MPI solution ---*/
1099 
1100  InitiateComms(geometry, config, SOLUTION_EDDY);
1101  CompleteComms(geometry, config, SOLUTION_EDDY);
1102 
1103  /*--- Initializate quantities for SlidingMesh Interface ---*/
1104 
1105  unsigned long iMarker;
1106 
1107  SlidingState = new su2double*** [nMarker];
1108  SlidingStateNodes = new int* [nMarker];
1109 
1110  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
1111 
1112  SlidingState[iMarker] = NULL;
1113  SlidingStateNodes[iMarker] = NULL;
1114 
1115  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == FLUID_INTERFACE){
1116 
1117  SlidingState[iMarker] = new su2double**[geometry->GetnVertex(iMarker)];
1118  SlidingStateNodes[iMarker] = new int [geometry->GetnVertex(iMarker)];
1119 
1120  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnVertex(iMarker); iPoint++){
1121  SlidingState[iMarker][iPoint] = new su2double*[nPrimVar+1];
1122 
1123  SlidingStateNodes[iMarker][iPoint] = 0;
1124  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nPrimVar+1; iVar++)
1125  SlidingState[iMarker][iPoint][iVar] = NULL;
1126  }
1127 
1128  }
1129  }
1130 
1131  /*-- Allocation of inlets has to happen in derived classes (not CTurbSolver),
1132  * due to arbitrary number of turbulence variables ---*/
1133 
1134  Inlet_TurbVars = new su2double**[nMarker];
1135  for (unsigned long iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
1136  Inlet_TurbVars[iMarker] = new su2double*[nVertex[iMarker]];
1137  for(unsigned long iVertex=0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++){
1138  Inlet_TurbVars[iMarker][iVertex] = new su2double[nVar];
1139  Inlet_TurbVars[iMarker][iVertex][0] = nu_tilde_Inf;
1140  }
1141  }
1142 
1143  /*--- The turbulence models are always solved implicitly, so set the
1144  implicit flag in case we have periodic BCs. ---*/
1145 
1146  SetImplicitPeriodic(true);
1147 
1148  /* Store the initial CFL number for all grid points. */
1149 
1150  const su2double CFL = config->GetCFL(MGLevel);
1151  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
1152  nodes->SetLocalCFL(iPoint, CFL);
1153  }
1154  Min_CFL_Local = CFL;
1155  Max_CFL_Local = CFL;
1156  Avg_CFL_Local = CFL;
1157 
1158  /*--- Add the solver name (max 8 characters) ---*/
1159  SolverName = "SA";
1160 
1161 }
1162 
1163 CTurbSASolver::~CTurbSASolver(void) {
1164 
1165  unsigned long iMarker, iVertex;
1166  unsigned short iVar;
1167 
1168  if ( SlidingState != NULL ) {
1169  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
1170  if ( SlidingState[iMarker] != NULL ) {
1171  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++)
1172  if ( SlidingState[iMarker][iVertex] != NULL ){
1173  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nPrimVar+1; iVar++)
1174  delete [] SlidingState[iMarker][iVertex][iVar];
1175  delete [] SlidingState[iMarker][iVertex];
1176  }
1177  delete [] SlidingState[iMarker];
1178  }
1179  }
1180  delete [] SlidingState;
1181  }
1182 
1183  if ( SlidingStateNodes != NULL ){
1184  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
1185  if (SlidingStateNodes[iMarker] != NULL)
1186  delete [] SlidingStateNodes[iMarker];
1187  }
1188  delete [] SlidingStateNodes;
1189  }
1190 
1191 }
1192 
1193 void CTurbSASolver::Preprocessing(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh, unsigned short iRKStep, unsigned short RunTime_EqSystem, bool Output) {
1194 
1195  unsigned long iPoint;
1196  bool limiter_turb = (config->GetKind_SlopeLimit_Turb() != NO_LIMITER) && (config->GetInnerIter() <= config->GetLimiterIter());
1197  unsigned short kind_hybridRANSLES = config->GetKind_HybridRANSLES();
1198  su2double** PrimGrad_Flow = NULL;
1199  su2double* Vorticity = NULL;
1200  su2double Laminar_Viscosity = 0;
1201 
1202  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint ++) {
1203 
1204  /*--- Initialize the residual vector ---*/
1205 
1206  LinSysRes.SetBlock_Zero(iPoint);
1207 
1208  }
1209 
1210  /*--- Initialize the Jacobian matrices ---*/
1211 
1212  Jacobian.SetValZero();
1213 
1214  /*--- Upwind second order reconstruction and gradients ---*/
1215 
1216  if (config->GetReconstructionGradientRequired()) {
1217  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method_Recon() == GREEN_GAUSS)
1218  SetSolution_Gradient_GG(geometry, config, true);
1219  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method_Recon() == LEAST_SQUARES)
1220  SetSolution_Gradient_LS(geometry, config, true);
1221  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method_Recon() == WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES)
1222  SetSolution_Gradient_LS(geometry, config, true);
1223  }
1224  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == GREEN_GAUSS) SetSolution_Gradient_GG(geometry, config);
1225  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES) SetSolution_Gradient_LS(geometry, config);
1226 
1227  if (limiter_turb) SetSolution_Limiter(geometry, config);
1228 
1229  if (kind_hybridRANSLES != NO_HYBRIDRANSLES){
1230 
1231  /*--- Set the vortex tilting coefficient at every node if required ---*/
1232 
1233  if (kind_hybridRANSLES == SA_EDDES){
1234  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++){
1235  PrimGrad_Flow = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetGradient_Primitive(iPoint);
1236  Vorticity = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetVorticity(iPoint);
1237  Laminar_Viscosity = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetLaminarViscosity(iPoint);
1238  nodes->SetVortex_Tilting(iPoint,PrimGrad_Flow, Vorticity, Laminar_Viscosity);
1239  }
1240  }
1241 
1242  /*--- Compute the DES length scale ---*/
1243 
1244  SetDES_LengthScale(solver_container, geometry, config);
1245 
1246  }
1247 }
1248 
1249 void CTurbSASolver::Postprocessing(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) {
1250 
1251  su2double rho = 0.0, mu = 0.0, nu, *nu_hat, muT, Ji, Ji_3, fv1;
1252  su2double cv1_3 = 7.1*7.1*7.1;
1253  unsigned long iPoint;
1254 
1255  bool neg_spalart_allmaras = (config->GetKind_Turb_Model() == SA_NEG);
1256 
1257  /*--- Compute eddy viscosity ---*/
1258 
1259  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint ++) {
1260 
1261  rho = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(iPoint);
1262  mu = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetLaminarViscosity(iPoint);
1263 
1264  nu = mu/rho;
1265  nu_hat = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint);
1266 
1267  Ji = nu_hat[0]/nu;
1268  Ji_3 = Ji*Ji*Ji;
1269  fv1 = Ji_3/(Ji_3+cv1_3);
1270 
1271  muT = rho*fv1*nu_hat[0];
1272 
1273  if (neg_spalart_allmaras && (muT < 0.0)) muT = 0.0;
1274 
1275  nodes->SetmuT(iPoint,muT);
1276 
1277  }
1278 
1279 }
1280 
1281 void CTurbSASolver::Source_Residual(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics, CNumerics *second_numerics,
1282  CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) {
1283  unsigned long iPoint;
1284 
1285  bool harmonic_balance = (config->GetTime_Marching() == HARMONIC_BALANCE);
1286  bool transition = (config->GetKind_Trans_Model() == LM);
1287  bool transition_BC = (config->GetKind_Trans_Model() == BC);
1288 
1289  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
1290 
1291  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
1292 
1293  numerics->SetPrimitive(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint), NULL);
1294 
1295  /*--- Gradient of the primitive and conservative variables ---*/
1296 
1297  numerics->SetPrimVarGradient(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetGradient_Primitive(iPoint), NULL);
1298 
1299  /*--- Set vorticity and strain rate magnitude ---*/
1300 
1301  numerics->SetVorticity(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetVorticity(iPoint), NULL);
1302 
1303  numerics->SetStrainMag(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetStrainMag(iPoint), 0.0);
1304 
1305  /*--- Set intermittency ---*/
1306 
1307  if (transition) {
1308  numerics->SetIntermittency(solver_container[TRANS_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetIntermittency(iPoint));
1309  }
1310 
1311  /*--- Turbulent variables w/o reconstruction, and its gradient ---*/
1312 
1313  numerics->SetTurbVar(nodes->GetSolution(iPoint), NULL);
1314  numerics->SetTurbVarGradient(nodes->GetGradient(iPoint), NULL);
1315 
1316  /*--- Set volume ---*/
1317 
1318  numerics->SetVolume(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume());
1319 
1320  /*--- Get Hybrid RANS/LES Type and set the appropriate wall distance ---*/
1321 
1322  if (config->GetKind_HybridRANSLES() == NO_HYBRIDRANSLES) {
1323 
1324  /*--- Set distance to the surface ---*/
1325 
1326  numerics->SetDistance(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetWall_Distance(), 0.0);
1327 
1328  } else {
1329 
1330  /*--- Set DES length scale ---*/
1331 
1332  numerics->SetDistance(nodes->GetDES_LengthScale(iPoint), 0.0);
1333 
1334  }
1335 
1336  /*--- Compute the source term ---*/
1337 
1338  numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, NULL, config);
1339 
1340  /*--- Store the intermittency ---*/
1341 
1342  if (transition_BC) {
1343  nodes->SetGammaBC(iPoint,numerics->GetGammaBC());
1344  }
1345 
1346  /*--- Subtract residual and the Jacobian ---*/
1347 
1348  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual);
1349 
1350  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
1351 
1352  }
1353 
1354  if (harmonic_balance) {
1355 
1356  su2double Volume, Source;
1357  unsigned short nVar_Turb = solver_container[TURB_SOL]->GetnVar();
1358 
1359  /*--- Loop over points ---*/
1360 
1361  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
1362 
1363  /*--- Get control volume ---*/
1364 
1365  Volume = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
1366 
1367  /*--- Access stored harmonic balance source term ---*/
1368 
1369  for (unsigned short iVar = 0; iVar < nVar_Turb; iVar++) {
1370  Source = nodes->GetHarmonicBalance_Source(iPoint,iVar);
1371  Residual[iVar] = Source*Volume;
1372  }
1373 
1374  /*--- Add Residual ---*/
1375 
1376  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
1377 
1378  }
1379  }
1380 
1381 }

1388 void CTurbSASolver::BC_HeatFlux_Wall(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
1389  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex;
1390  unsigned short iVar;
1391 
1392  /*--- The dirichlet condition is used only without wall function, otherwise the
1393  convergence is compromised as we are providing nu tilde values for the
1394  first point of the wall ---*/
1395 
1396  if (!config->GetWall_Functions()) {
1397 
1398  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
1399  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
1400 
1401  /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e, not a halo node) ---*/
1402 
1403  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
1404 
1405  /*--- Get the velocity vector ---*/
1406 
1407  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1408  Solution[iVar] = 0.0;
1409 
1410  nodes->SetSolution_Old(iPoint,Solution);
1411  LinSysRes.SetBlock_Zero(iPoint);
1412 
1413  /*--- Includes 1 in the diagonal ---*/
1414 
1415  Jacobian.DeleteValsRowi(iPoint);
1416  }
1417  }
1418  }
1419  else {
1420 
1421  /*--- Evaluate nu tilde at the closest point to the surface using the wall functions ---*/
1422 
1423  SetNuTilde_WF(geometry, solver_container, conv_numerics, visc_numerics, config, val_marker);
1424 
1425  }
1426 
1427 }

1456 void CTurbSASolver::BC_Far_Field(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
1457 
1458  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex;
1459  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
1460  su2double *Normal, *V_infty, *V_domain;
1461 
1462  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
1463 
1464  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
1465 
1466  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
1467 
1468  /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e, not a halo node) ---*/
1469 
1470  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
1471 
1472  /*--- Allocate the value at the infinity ---*/
1473 
1474  V_infty = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
1475 
1476  /*--- Retrieve solution at the farfield boundary node ---*/
1477 
1478  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint);
1479 
1480  /*--- Grid Movement ---*/
1481 
1482  if (dynamic_grid)
1483  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
1484 
1485  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_infty);
1486 
1487  /*--- Set turbulent variable at the wall, and at infinity ---*/
1488 
1489  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1490  Solution_i[iVar] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,iVar);
1491  Solution_j[0] = nu_tilde_Inf;
1492  conv_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
1493 
1494  /*--- Set Normal (it is necessary to change the sign) ---*/
1495 
1496  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
1497  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
1498  Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
1499  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
1500 
1501  /*--- Compute residuals and Jacobians ---*/
1502 
1503  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
1504 
1505  /*--- Add residuals and Jacobians ---*/
1506 
1507  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
1508  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
1509 
1510  }
1511  }
1512 
1513  delete [] Normal;
1514 
1515 }

1517 void CTurbSASolver::BC_Inlet(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
1518 
1519  unsigned short iDim;
1520  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
1521  su2double *V_inlet, *V_domain, *Normal;
1522 
1523  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
1524 
1525  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(val_marker);
1526 
1527  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
1528 
1529  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
1530 
1531  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
1532 
1533  /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e., not a halo node) ---*/
1534 
1535  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
1536 
1537  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
1538 
1539  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
1540  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
1541 
1542  /*--- Allocate the value at the inlet ---*/
1543 
1544  V_inlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
1545 
1546  /*--- Retrieve solution at the farfield boundary node ---*/
1547 
1548  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint);
1549 
1550  /*--- Set various quantities in the solver class ---*/
1551 
1552  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
1553 
1554  /*--- Set the turbulent variable states (prescribed for an inflow) ---*/
1555 
1556  Solution_i[0] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,0);
1557 
1558  /*--- Load the inlet turbulence variable (uniform by default). ---*/
1559 
1560  Solution_j[0] = Inlet_TurbVars[val_marker][iVertex][0];
1561 
1562  conv_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
1563 
1564  /*--- Set various other quantities in the conv_numerics class ---*/
1565 
1566  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
1567 
1568  if (dynamic_grid)
1569  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(),
1570  geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
1571 
1572  /*--- Compute the residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
1573 
1574  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
1575  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
1576 
1577  /*--- Jacobian contribution for implicit integration ---*/
1578 
1579  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
1580 
1581 // /*--- Viscous contribution, commented out because serious convergence problems ---*/
1582 //
1583 // visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());
1584 // visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
1585 //
1586 // /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
1587 //
1588 // visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
1589 //
1590 // /*--- Turbulent variables w/o reconstruction, and its gradients ---*/
1591 //
1592 // visc_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
1593 // visc_numerics->SetTurbVarGradient(node[iPoint]->GetGradient(), node[iPoint]->GetGradient());
1594 //
1595 // /*--- Compute residual, and Jacobians ---*/
1596 //
1597 // visc_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
1598 //
1599 // /*--- Subtract residual, and update Jacobians ---*/
1600 //
1601 // LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual);
1602 // Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
1603 
1604  }
1605  }
1606 
1607  /*--- Free locally allocated memory ---*/
1608  delete[] Normal;
1609 
1610 }

1612 void CTurbSASolver::BC_Outlet(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics,
1613  CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
1614  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex;
1615  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
1616  su2double *V_outlet, *V_domain, *Normal;
1617 
1618  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
1619 
1620  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
1621 
1622  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
1623  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
1624 
1625  /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e., not a halo node) ---*/
1626 
1627  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
1628 
1629  /*--- Allocate the value at the outlet ---*/
1630 
1631  V_outlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
1632 
1633  /*--- Retrieve solution at the farfield boundary node ---*/
1634 
1635  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint);
1636 
1637  /*--- Set various quantities in the solver class ---*/
1638 
1639  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_outlet);
1640 
1641  /*--- Set the turbulent variables. Here we use a Neumann BC such
1642  that the turbulent variable is copied from the interior of the
1643  domain to the outlet before computing the residual.
1644  Solution_i --> TurbVar_internal,
1645  Solution_j --> TurbVar_outlet ---*/
1646 
1647  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
1648  Solution_i[iVar] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,iVar);
1649  Solution_j[iVar] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,iVar);
1650  }
1651  conv_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
1652 
1653  /*--- Set Normal (negate for outward convention) ---*/
1654 
1655  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
1656  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
1657  Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
1658  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
1659 
1660  if (dynamic_grid)
1661  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(),
1662  geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
1663 
1664  /*--- Compute the residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
1665 
1666  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
1667  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
1668 
1669  /*--- Jacobian contribution for implicit integration ---*/
1670 
1671  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
1672 
1673 // /*--- Viscous contribution, commented out because serious convergence problems ---*/
1674 //
1675 // visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());

1705 void CTurbSASolver::BC_Engine_Inflow(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
1706 
1707  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex;
1708  unsigned short iDim;
1709  su2double *V_inflow, *V_domain, *Normal;
1710 
1711  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
1712 
1713  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
1714 
1715  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
1716 
1717  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
1718 
1719  /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e., not a halo node) ---*/
1720 
1721  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
1722 
1723  /*--- Allocate the value at the infinity ---*/
1724 
1725  V_inflow = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
1726 
1727  /*--- Retrieve solution at the farfield boundary node ---*/
1728 
1729  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint);
1730 
1731  /*--- Set various quantities in the solver class ---*/
1732 
1733  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inflow);
1734 
1735  /*--- Set the turbulent variables. Here we use a Neumann BC such
1736  that the turbulent variable is copied from the interior of the
1737  domain to the outlet before computing the residual. ---*/
1738 
1739  conv_numerics->SetTurbVar(nodes->GetSolution(iPoint), nodes->GetSolution(iPoint));
1740 
1741  /*--- Set Normal (negate for outward convention) ---*/
1742 
1743  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
1744  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
1745  Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
1746  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
1747 
1748  /*--- Set grid movement ---*/
1749 
1750  if (dynamic_grid)
1751  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(),
1752  geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
1753 
1754  /*--- Compute the residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
1755 
1756  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
1757  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
1758 
1759  /*--- Jacobian contribution for implicit integration ---*/
1760 
1761  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
1762 
1763 // /*--- Viscous contribution, commented out because serious convergence problems ---*/
1764 //
1765 // visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord());
1766 // visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
1767 //
1768 // /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
1769 //
1770 // visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inflow);
1771 //
1772 // /*--- Turbulent variables w/o reconstruction, and its gradients ---*/
1773 //
1774 // visc_numerics->SetTurbVar(node[iPoint]->GetSolution(), node[iPoint]->GetSolution());
1775 // visc_numerics->SetTurbVarGradient(node[iPoint]->GetGradient(), node[iPoint]->GetGradient());
1776 //
1777 // /*--- Compute residual, and Jacobians ---*/
1778 //
1779 // visc_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
1780 //
1781 // /*--- Subtract residual, and update Jacobians ---*/
1782 //
1783 // LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual);
1784 // Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
1785 
1786  }
1787 
1788  }
1789

1791

1907 void CTurbSASolver::BC_ActDisk(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics,
1908  CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker, bool val_inlet_surface) {
1909 
1910  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex, GlobalIndex_donor, GlobalIndex;
1911  su2double *V_outlet, *V_inlet, *V_domain, *Normal, *UnitNormal, Area, Vn;
1912  bool ReverseFlow;
1913  unsigned short iDim;
1914 
1915  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
1916  UnitNormal = new su2double[nDim];
1917 
1918  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
1919 
1920  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
1921 
1922  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
1923  GlobalIndex_donor = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetDonorGlobalIndex(val_marker, iVertex);
1924  GlobalIndex = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex();
1925 
1926  /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e., not a halo node) ---*/
1927 
1928  if ((geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) && (GlobalIndex != GlobalIndex_donor)) {
1929 
1930  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
1931 
1932  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
1933  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
1934  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
1935 
1936  Area = 0.0;
1937  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
1938  Area = sqrt (Area);
1939 
1940  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
1941  UnitNormal[iDim] = Normal[iDim]/Area;
1942 
1943  /*--- Retrieve solution at the farfield boundary node ---*/
1944 
1945  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint);
1946 
1947  /*--- Check the flow direction. Project the flow into the normal to the inlet face ---*/
1948 
1949  Vn = 0.0; ReverseFlow = false;
1950  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) { Vn += V_domain[iDim+1]*UnitNormal[iDim]; }
1951 
1952  if ((val_inlet_surface) && (Vn < 0.0)) { ReverseFlow = true; }
1953  if ((!val_inlet_surface) && (Vn > 0.0)) { ReverseFlow = true; }
1954 
1955  /*--- Do not anything if there is a
1956  reverse flow, Euler b.c. for the direct problem ---*/
1957 
1958  if (!ReverseFlow) {
1959 
1960  /*--- Allocate the value at the infinity ---*/
1961 
1962  if (val_inlet_surface) {
1963  V_inlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
1964  V_outlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetDonorPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
1965  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
1966  }
1967  else {
1968  V_outlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
1969  V_inlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetDonorPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
1970  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_outlet);
1971  }
1972 
1973  /*--- Set the turb. variable solution
1974  set the turbulent variables. Here we use a Neumann BC such
1975  that the turbulent variable is copied from the interior of the
1976  domain to the outlet before computing the residual.
1977  or set the turbulent variable states (prescribed for an inflow) ----*/
1978 
1979  Solution_i[0] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,0);
1980 
1981  // if (val_inlet_surface) Solution_j[0] = 0.5*(nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,0)+V_outlet [nDim+9]);
1982  // else Solution_j[0] = 0.5*(nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,0)+V_inlet [nDim+9]);
1983 
1984  // /*--- Inflow analysis (interior extrapolation) ---*/
1985  // if (((val_inlet_surface) && (!ReverseFlow)) || ((!val_inlet_surface) && (ReverseFlow))) {
1986  // Solution_j[0] = 2.0*node[iPoint]->GetSolution(0) - node[iPoint_Normal]->GetSolution(0);
1987  // }
1988 
1989  // /*--- Outflow analysis ---*/
1990  // else {
1991  // if (val_inlet_surface) Solution_j[0] = Factor_nu_ActDisk*V_outlet [nDim+9];
1992  // else { Solution_j[0] = Factor_nu_ActDisk*V_inlet [nDim+9]; }
1993  // }
1994 
1995  /*--- Inflow analysis (interior extrapolation) ---*/
1996  if (((val_inlet_surface) && (!ReverseFlow)) || ((!val_inlet_surface) && (ReverseFlow))) {
1997  Solution_j[0] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,0);
1998  }
1999 
2000  /*--- Outflow analysis ---*/
2001  else {
2002  Solution_j[0] = nu_tilde_ActDisk;
2003  }
2004 
2005  conv_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
2006 
2007  /*--- Grid Movement ---*/
2008 
2009  if (dynamic_grid)
2010  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
2011 
2012  /*--- Compute the residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
2013 
2014  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
2015  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
2016 
2017  /*--- Jacobian contribution for implicit integration ---*/
2018 
2019  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
2020 
2021 // /*--- Viscous contribution, commented out because serious convergence problems ---*/
2022 //
2023 // visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
2024 // visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[iPoint_Normal]->GetCoord());
2025 //
2026 // /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
2027 //
2028 // if (val_inlet_surface) visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
2029 // else visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_outlet);
2030 //
2031 // /*--- Turbulent variables w/o reconstruction, and its gradients ---*/
2032 //
2033 // visc_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
2034 //
2035 // visc_numerics->SetTurbVarGradient(node[iPoint]->GetGradient(), node[iPoint]->GetGradient());
2036 //
2037 // /*--- Compute residual, and Jacobians ---*/
2038 //
2039 // visc_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
2040 //
2041 // /*--- Subtract residual, and update Jacobians ---*/
2042 //
2043 // LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual);
2044 // Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
2045 
2046  }
2047  }
2048  }
2049 
2050  /*--- Free locally allocated memory ---*/
2051 
2052  delete[] Normal;
2053  delete[] UnitNormal;
2054 
2055 }

2057 void CTurbSASolver::BC_Inlet_MixingPlane(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
2058 
2059  unsigned short iDim, iSpan;
2060  unsigned long oldVertex, iPoint, Point_Normal;
2061  long iVertex;
2062  su2double *V_inlet, *V_domain, *Normal;
2063  su2double extAverageNu;
2064  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
2065 
2066  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(val_marker);
2067  unsigned short nSpanWiseSections = config->GetnSpanWiseSections();
2068 
2069  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
2070  for (iSpan= 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections ; iSpan++){
2071  extAverageNu = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetExtAverageNu(val_marker, iSpan);
2072 
2073  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
2074 
2075  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertexSpan[val_marker][iSpan]; iVertex++) {
2076 
2077  /*--- find the node related to the vertex ---*/
2078  iPoint = geometry->turbovertex[val_marker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetNode();
2079 
2080  /*--- using the other vertex information for retrieving some information ---*/
2081  oldVertex = geometry->turbovertex[val_marker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetOldVertex();
2082 
2083  /*--- Index of the closest interior node ---*/
2084  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][oldVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
2085 
2086  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
2087 
2088  geometry->vertex[val_marker][oldVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
2089  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
2090 
2091  /*--- Allocate the value at the inlet ---*/
2092  V_inlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, oldVertex);
2093 
2094  /*--- Retrieve solution at the farfield boundary node ---*/
2095 
2096  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint);
2097 
2098  /*--- Set various quantities in the solver class ---*/
2099 
2100  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
2101 
2102  /*--- Set the turbulent variable states (prescribed for an inflow) ---*/
2103 
2104  Solution_i[0] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,0);
2105  Solution_j[0] = extAverageNu;
2106 
2107  conv_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
2108 
2109  /*--- Set various other quantities in the conv_numerics class ---*/
2110 
2111  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
2112 
2113  conv_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
2114 
2115  /*--- Set various other quantities in the conv_numerics class ---*/
2116 
2117  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
2118 
2119  if (dynamic_grid)
2120  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(),
2121  geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
2122 
2123  /*--- Compute the residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
2124 
2125  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
2126  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
2127 
2128  /*--- Jacobian contribution for implicit integration ---*/
2129 
2130  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
2131 
2132  /*--- Viscous contribution ---*/
2133 
2134  visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());
2135  visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
2136 
2137  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
2138 
2139  visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
2140 
2141  /*--- Turbulent variables w/o reconstruction, and its gradients ---*/
2142 
2143  visc_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
2144  visc_numerics->SetTurbVarGradient(nodes->GetGradient(iPoint), nodes->GetGradient(iPoint));
2145 
2146  /*--- Compute residual, and Jacobians ---*/
2147 
2148  visc_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
2149 
2150  /*--- Subtract residual, and update Jacobians ---*/
2151 
2152  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual);
2153  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
2154 
2155  }
2156  }
2157 
2158  /*--- Free locally allocated memory ---*/
2159  delete[] Normal;
2160

2163 void CTurbSASolver::BC_Inlet_Turbo(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
2164 
2165  unsigned short iDim, iSpan;
2166  unsigned long oldVertex, iPoint, Point_Normal;
2167  long iVertex;

2169 
2170  su2double rho, pressure, muLam, Factor_nu_Inf, nu_tilde;

2178

2202

2204

2206  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];

2209  V_inlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, oldVertex);
2210 
2211  /*--- Retrieve solution at the farfield boundary node ---*/
2212 
2213  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint);
2214 
2215  /*--- Set various quantities in the solver class ---*/
2216 
2217  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
2218 
2219  /*--- Set the turbulent variable states (prescribed for an inflow) ---*/
2220 
2221  Solution_i[0] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,0);
2222  Solution_j[0] = nu_tilde;
2223 
2224  conv_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
2225 
2226  /*--- Set various other quantities in the conv_numerics class ---*/
2227 
2228  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);

2235 
2236  if (dynamic_grid)
2237  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(),
2238  geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
2239 
2240  /*--- Compute the residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
2241 
2242  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);

2248 
2249  /*--- Viscous contribution ---*/
2250 
2251  visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());
2252  visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
2253 
2254  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
2255 
2256  visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
2257 
2258  /*--- Turbulent variables w/o reconstruction, and its gradients ---*/
2259 
2260  visc_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
2261  visc_numerics->SetTurbVarGradient(nodes->GetGradient(iPoint), nodes->GetGradient(iPoint));
2262 
2263  /*--- Compute residual, and Jacobians ---*/
2264 
2265  visc_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
2266 
2267  /*--- Subtract residual, and update Jacobians ---*/
2268 
2269  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual);
2270  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
2271 
2272  }
2273  }
2274 
2275  /*--- Free locally allocated memory ---*/
2276  delete[] Normal;
2277 
2278 }

2443 void CTurbSASolver::BC_Fluid_Interface(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics,
2444  CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config){
2445 
2446  unsigned long iVertex, jVertex, iPoint, Point_Normal = 0;
2447  unsigned short iDim, iVar, iMarker;
2448 
2449  unsigned short nPrimVar = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetnPrimVar();
2450  su2double *Normal = new su2double[nDim];
2451  su2double *PrimVar_i = new su2double[nPrimVar];
2452  su2double *PrimVar_j = new su2double[nPrimVar];
2453  su2double *tmp_residual = new su2double[nVar];
2454 
2455  unsigned long nDonorVertex;
2456  su2double weight;
2457 
2458  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
2459 
2460  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == FLUID_INTERFACE) {
2461 
2462  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
2463 
2464  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2465  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
2466 
2467  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
2468 
2469  nDonorVertex = GetnSlidingStates(iMarker, iVertex);
2470 
2471  /*--- Initialize Residual, this will serve to accumulate the average ---*/
2472 
2473  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
2474  Residual[iVar] = 0.0;
2475 
2476  /*--- Loop over the nDonorVertexes and compute the averaged flux ---*/
2477 
2478  for (jVertex = 0; jVertex < nDonorVertex; jVertex++){
2479 
2480  geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
2481  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
2482 
2483  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nPrimVar; iVar++) {
2484  PrimVar_i[iVar] = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint,iVar);
2485  PrimVar_j[iVar] = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetSlidingState(iMarker, iVertex, iVar, jVertex);
2486  }
2487 
2488  /*--- Get the weight computed in the interpolator class for the j-th donor vertex ---*/
2489 
2490  weight = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetSlidingState(iMarker, iVertex, nPrimVar, jVertex);
2491 
2492  /*--- Set primitive variables ---*/
2493 
2494  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive( PrimVar_i, PrimVar_j );
2495 
2496  /*--- Set the turbulent variable states ---*/
2497  Solution_i[0] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,0);
2498  Solution_j[0] = GetSlidingState(iMarker, iVertex, 0, jVertex);
2499 
2500  conv_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
2501  /*--- Set the normal vector ---*/
2502 
2503  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
2504 
2505  if (dynamic_grid)
2506  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
2507 
2508  /*--- Compute the convective residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
2509 
2510  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(tmp_residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
2511 
2512  /*--- Accumulate the residuals to compute the average ---*/
2513 
2514  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
2515  Residual[iVar] += weight*tmp_residual[iVar];
2516 
2517  }
2518 
2519  /*--- Add Residuals and Jacobians ---*/
2520 
2521  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
2522 
2523  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
2524 
2525  /*--- Set the normal vector and the coordinates ---*/
2526 
2527  visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
2528  visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());
2529 
2530  /*--- Primitive variables, and gradient ---*/
2531 
2532  visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(PrimVar_i, PrimVar_j);
2533  // visc_numerics->SetPrimVarGradient(node[iPoint]->GetGradient_Primitive(), node[iPoint]->GetGradient_Primitive());
2534 
2535  /*--- Turbulent variables and its gradients ---*/
2536 
2537  visc_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
2538  visc_numerics->SetTurbVarGradient(nodes->GetGradient(iPoint), nodes->GetGradient(iPoint));
2539 
2540  /*--- Compute and update residual ---*/
2541 
2542  visc_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
2543 
2544  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual);
2545 
2546  /*--- Jacobian contribution for implicit integration ---*/
2547 
2548  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
2549 
2550  }
2551  }
2552  }
2553  }
2554 
2555  /*--- Free locally allocated memory ---*/
2556 
2557  delete [] tmp_residual;
2558  delete [] Normal;
2559  delete [] PrimVar_i;
2560  delete [] PrimVar_j;
2561 
2562 }
