2727 void CTurbSASolver::SetNuTilde_WF(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics,
2728  CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
2729 
2730  /*--- Local variables ---*/
2731 
2732  unsigned short iDim, jDim, iVar, iNode;
2733  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, iPoint_Neighbor, counter;
2734 
2735  su2double func, func_prim;
2736  su2double *Normal, Area;
2737  su2double div_vel, UnitNormal[3];
2738  su2double **grad_primvar, tau[3][3];
2739  su2double Vel[3], VelNormal, VelTang[3], VelTangMod, VelInfMod, WallDist[3], WallDistMod;
2740  su2double Lam_Visc_Normal, Kin_Visc_Normal, dypw_dyp, Eddy_Visc, nu_til_old, nu_til, cv1_3;
2741  su2double T_Normal, P_Normal, Density_Normal;
2742  su2double Density_Wall, T_Wall, P_Wall, Lam_Visc_Wall, Tau_Wall, Tau_Wall_Old;
2743  su2double *Coord, *Coord_Normal;
2744  su2double diff, Delta;
2745  su2double U_Tau, U_Plus = 0.0, Gam = 0.0, Beta = 0.0, Phi, Q = 0.0, Y_Plus_White = 0.0, Y_Plus;
2746  su2double TauElem[3], TauNormal, TauTangent[3], WallShearStress;
2747  su2double Gas_Constant = config->GetGas_ConstantND();
2748  su2double Cp = (Gamma / Gamma_Minus_One) * Gas_Constant;
2749 
2750  unsigned short max_iter = 100;
2751  su2double tol = 1e-10;
2752 
2753  /*--- Get the freestream velocity magnitude for non-dim. purposes ---*/
2754 
2755  su2double *VelInf = config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND();
2756  VelInfMod = 0.0;
2757  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2758  VelInfMod += VelInf[iDim];
2759  VelInfMod = sqrt(VelInfMod);
2760 
2761  /*--- Compute the recovery factor ---*/
2762  // su2double-check: laminar or turbulent Pr for this?
2763  su2double Recovery = pow(config->GetPrandtl_Lam(),(1.0/3.0));
2764 
2765  /*--- Typical constants from boundary layer theory ---*/
2766 
2767  su2double kappa = 0.4;
2768  su2double B = 5.5;
2769 
2770  /*--- Identify the boundary by string name ---*/
2771 
2772  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(val_marker);
2773 
2774  /*--- Get the specified wall heat flux from config ---*/
2775 
2776  // Wall_HeatFlux = config->GetWall_HeatFlux(Marker_Tag);
2777 
2778  /*--- Loop over all of the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
2779 
2780  for(iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
2781  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2782 
2783  /*--- We can use also GetNormal_Neighbor, and eliminate the following loop ---*/
2784 
2785  iPoint_Neighbor = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
2786 
2787  for(iNode = 0; iNode < geometry->node[iPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNode++) {
2788  iPoint_Neighbor = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNode);
2789 
2790  /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e, not a halo node)
2791  and the neighbor is not part of the physical boundary ---*/
2792 
2793  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain() && (!geometry->node[iPoint_Neighbor]->GetBoundary())) {
2794 
2795  /*--- Get coordinates of the current vertex and nearest normal point ---*/
2796 
2797  Coord = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
2798  Coord_Normal = geometry->node[iPoint_Neighbor]->GetCoord();
2799 
2800  /*--- Compute dual-grid area and boundary normal ---*/
2801 
2802  Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
2803 
2804  Area = 0.0;
2805  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2806  Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
2807  Area = sqrt (Area);
2808 
2809  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2810  UnitNormal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim]/Area;
2811 
2812  /*--- Get the velocity, pressure, and temperature at the nearest
2813  (normal) interior point. ---*/
2814 
2815  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2816  Vel[iDim] = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetVelocity(iPoint_Neighbor,iDim);
2817  P_Normal = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPressure(iPoint_Neighbor);
2818  T_Normal = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetTemperature(iPoint_Neighbor);
2819 
2820  /*--- Compute the wall-parallel velocity at first point off the wall ---*/
2821 
2822  VelNormal = 0.0;
2823  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2824  VelNormal += Vel[iDim] * UnitNormal[iDim];
2825  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2826  VelTang[iDim] = Vel[iDim] - VelNormal*UnitNormal[iDim];
2827 
2828  VelTangMod = 0.0;
2829  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2830  VelTangMod += VelTang[iDim]*VelTang[iDim];
2831  VelTangMod = sqrt(VelTangMod);
2832 
2833  /*--- Compute normal distance of the interior point from the wall ---*/
2834 
2835  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2836  WallDist[iDim] = (Coord[iDim] - Coord_Normal[iDim]);
2837 
2838  WallDistMod = 0.0;
2839  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2840  WallDistMod += WallDist[iDim]*WallDist[iDim];
2841  WallDistMod = sqrt(WallDistMod);
2842 
2843  /*--- Compute mach number ---*/
2844 
2845  // M_Normal = VelTangMod / sqrt(Gamma * Gas_Constant * T_Normal);
2846 
2847  /*--- Compute the wall temperature using the Crocco-Buseman equation ---*/
2848 
2849  //T_Wall = T_Normal * (1.0 + 0.5*Gamma_Minus_One*Recovery*M_Normal*M_Normal);
2850  T_Wall = T_Normal + Recovery*pow(VelTangMod,2.0)/(2.0*Cp);
2851 
2852  /*--- Extrapolate the pressure from the interior & compute the
2853  wall density using the equation of state ---*/
2854 
2855  P_Wall = P_Normal;
2856  Density_Wall = P_Wall/(Gas_Constant*T_Wall);
2857 
2858  /*--- Compute the shear stress at the wall in the regular fashion
2859  by using the stress tensor on the surface ---*/
2860 
2861  Lam_Visc_Wall = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetLaminarViscosity(iPoint);
2862  grad_primvar = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetGradient_Primitive(iPoint);
2863 
2864  div_vel = 0.0;
2865  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2866  div_vel += grad_primvar[iDim+1][iDim];
2867 
2868  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2869  for (jDim = 0 ; jDim < nDim; jDim++) {
2870  Delta = 0.0; if (iDim == jDim) Delta = 1.0;
2871  tau[iDim][jDim] = Lam_Visc_Wall*( grad_primvar[jDim+1][iDim]
2872  + grad_primvar[iDim+1][jDim]) -
2873  TWO3*Lam_Visc_Wall*div_vel*Delta;
2874  }
2875  TauElem[iDim] = 0.0;
2876  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
2877  TauElem[iDim] += tau[iDim][jDim]*UnitNormal[jDim];
2878  }
2879 
2880  /*--- Compute wall shear stress as the magnitude of the wall-tangential
2881  component of the shear stress tensor---*/
2882 
2883  TauNormal = 0.0;
2884  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2885  TauNormal += TauElem[iDim] * UnitNormal[iDim];
2886 
2887  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2888  TauTangent[iDim] = TauElem[iDim] - TauNormal * UnitNormal[iDim];
2889 
2890  WallShearStress = 0.0;
2891  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2892  WallShearStress += TauTangent[iDim]*TauTangent[iDim];
2893  WallShearStress = sqrt(WallShearStress);
2894 
2895  /*--- Calculate the quantities from boundary layer theory and
2896  iteratively solve for a new wall shear stress. Use the current wall
2897  shear stress as a starting guess for the wall function. ---*/
2898 
2899  Tau_Wall_Old = WallShearStress;
2900  counter = 0; diff = 1.0;
2901 
2902  while (diff > tol) {
2903 
2904  /*--- Friction velocity and u+ ---*/
2905 
2906  U_Tau = sqrt(Tau_Wall_Old/Density_Wall);
2907  U_Plus = VelTangMod/U_Tau;
2908 
2909  /*--- Gamma, Beta, Q, and Phi, defined by Nichols & Nelson (2004) ---*/
2910 
2911  Gam = Recovery*U_Tau*U_Tau/(2.0*Cp*T_Wall);
2912  Beta = 0.0; // For adiabatic flows only
2913  Q = sqrt(Beta*Beta + 4.0*Gam);
2914  Phi = asin(-1.0*Beta/Q);
2915 
2916  /*--- Y+ defined by White & Christoph (compressibility and heat transfer) ---*/
2917 
2918  Y_Plus_White = exp((kappa/sqrt(Gam))*(asin((2.0*Gam*U_Plus - Beta)/Q) - Phi))*exp(-1.0*kappa*B);
2919 
2920  /*--- Spalding's universal form for the BL velocity with the
2921  outer velocity form of White & Christoph above. ---*/
2922 
2923  Y_Plus = U_Plus + Y_Plus_White - (exp(-1.0*kappa*B)*
2924  (1.0 + kappa*U_Plus + kappa*kappa*U_Plus*U_Plus/2.0 +
2925  kappa*kappa*kappa*U_Plus*U_Plus*U_Plus/6.0));
2926 
2927  /*--- Calculate an updated value for the wall shear stress
2928  using the y+ value, the definition of y+, and the definition of
2929  the friction velocity. ---*/
2930 
2931  Tau_Wall = (1.0/Density_Wall)*pow(Y_Plus*Lam_Visc_Wall/WallDistMod,2.0);
2932 
2933  /*--- Difference between the old and new Tau. Update old value. ---*/
2934 
2935  diff = fabs(Tau_Wall-Tau_Wall_Old);
2936  Tau_Wall_Old += 0.25*(Tau_Wall-Tau_Wall_Old);
2937 
2938  counter++;
2939  if (counter > max_iter) {
2940  cout << "WARNING: Tau_Wall evaluation has not converged in solver_direct_turbulent" << endl;
2941  break;
2942  }
2943 
2944  }
2945 
2946  /*--- Now compute the Eddy viscosity at the first point off of the wall ---*/
2947 
2948  Lam_Visc_Normal = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetLaminarViscosity(iPoint_Neighbor);
2949  Density_Normal = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(iPoint_Neighbor);
2950  Kin_Visc_Normal = Lam_Visc_Normal/Density_Normal;
2951 
2952  dypw_dyp = 2.0*Y_Plus_White*(kappa*sqrt(Gam)/Q)*sqrt(1.0 - pow(2.0*Gam*U_Plus - Beta,2.0)/(Q*Q));
2953  Eddy_Visc = Lam_Visc_Wall*(1.0 + dypw_dyp - kappa*exp(-1.0*kappa*B)*
2954  (1.0 + kappa*U_Plus
2955  + kappa*kappa*U_Plus*U_Plus/2.0)
2956  - Lam_Visc_Normal/Lam_Visc_Wall);
2957 
2958  /*--- Eddy viscosity should be always a positive number ---*/
2959 
2960  Eddy_Visc = max(0.0, Eddy_Visc);
2961 
2962  /*--- Solve for the new value of nu_tilde given the eddy viscosity and using a Newton method ---*/
2963 
2964  nu_til_old = 0.0; nu_til = 0.0; cv1_3 = 7.1*7.1*7.1;
2965  nu_til_old = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,0);
2966  counter = 0; diff = 1.0;
2967 
2968  while (diff > tol) {
2969 
2970  func = nu_til_old*nu_til_old*nu_til_old*nu_til_old - (Eddy_Visc/Density_Normal)*(nu_til_old*nu_til_old*nu_til_old + Kin_Visc_Normal*Kin_Visc_Normal*Kin_Visc_Normal*cv1_3);
2971  func_prim = 4.0 * nu_til_old*nu_til_old*nu_til_old - 3.0*(Eddy_Visc/Density_Normal)*(nu_til_old*nu_til_old);
2972  nu_til = nu_til_old - func/func_prim;
2973 
2974  diff = fabs(nu_til-nu_til_old);
2975  nu_til_old = nu_til;
2976 
2977  counter++;
2978  if (counter > max_iter) {
2979  cout << "WARNING: Nu_tilde evaluation has not converged." << endl;
2980  break;
2981  }
2982 
2983  }
2984 
2985  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
2986  Solution[iVar] = nu_til;
2987 
2988  nodes->SetSolution_Old(iPoint_Neighbor,Solution);
2989  LinSysRes.SetBlock_Zero(iPoint_Neighbor);
2990 
2991  /*--- includes 1 in the diagonal ---*/
2992 
2993  Jacobian.DeleteValsRowi(iPoint_Neighbor);
2994 
2995  }
2996 
2997  }
2998  }
2999 }

3001 void CTurbSASolver::SetDES_LengthScale(CSolver **solver, CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config){
3002 
3003  unsigned short kindHybridRANSLES = config->GetKind_HybridRANSLES();
3004  unsigned long iPoint = 0, jPoint = 0;
3005  unsigned short iDim = 0, jDim = 0, iNeigh = 0, nNeigh = 0;
3006 
3007  su2double constDES = config->GetConst_DES();
3008 
3009  su2double density = 0.0, laminarViscosity = 0.0, kinematicViscosity = 0.0,
3010  eddyViscosity = 0.0, kinematicViscosityTurb = 0.0, wallDistance = 0.0, lengthScale = 0.0;
3011 
3012  su2double maxDelta = 0.0, deltaAux = 0.0, distDES = 0.0, uijuij = 0.0, k2 = 0.0, r_d = 0.0, f_d = 0.0,
3013  deltaDDES = 0.0, omega = 0.0, ln_max = 0.0, ln[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0},
3014  aux_ln = 0.0, f_kh = 0.0;
3015 
3016  su2double nu_hat, fw_star = 0.424, cv1_3 = pow(7.1, 3.0); k2 = pow(0.41, 2.0);
3017  su2double cb1 = 0.1355, ct3 = 1.2, ct4 = 0.5;
3018  su2double sigma = 2./3., cb2 = 0.622, f_max=1.0, f_min=0.1, a1=0.15, a2=0.3;
3019  su2double cw1 = 0.0, Ji = 0.0, Ji_2 = 0.0, Ji_3 = 0.0, fv1 = 0.0, fv2 = 0.0, ft2 = 0.0, psi_2 = 0.0;
3020  su2double *coord_i = NULL, *coord_j = NULL, **primVarGrad = NULL, *vorticity = NULL, delta[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0},
3021  ratioOmega[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0}, vortexTiltingMeasure = 0.0;
3022 
3023  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++){
3024 
3025  coord_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
3026  nNeigh = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetnPoint();
3027  wallDistance = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetWall_Distance();
3028  primVarGrad = solver[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetGradient_Primitive(iPoint);
3029  vorticity = solver[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetVorticity(iPoint);
3030  density = solver[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(iPoint);
3031  laminarViscosity = solver[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetLaminarViscosity(iPoint);
3032  eddyViscosity = solver[TURB_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetmuT(iPoint);
3033  kinematicViscosity = laminarViscosity/density;
3034  kinematicViscosityTurb = eddyViscosity/density;
3035 
3036  uijuij = 0.0;
3037  for(iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++){
3038  for(jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++){
3039  uijuij += primVarGrad[1+iDim][jDim]*primVarGrad[1+iDim][jDim];
3040  }
3041  }
3042  uijuij = sqrt(fabs(uijuij));
3043  uijuij = max(uijuij,1e-10);
3044 
3045  /*--- Low Reynolds number correction term ---*/
3046 
3047  nu_hat = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,0);
3048  Ji = nu_hat/kinematicViscosity;
3049  Ji_2 = Ji * Ji;
3050  Ji_3 = Ji*Ji*Ji;
3051  fv1 = Ji_3/(Ji_3+cv1_3);
3052  fv2 = 1.0 - Ji/(1.0+Ji*fv1);
3053  ft2 = ct3*exp(-ct4*Ji_2);
3054  cw1 = cb1/k2+(1.0+cb2)/sigma;
3055 
3056  psi_2 = (1.0 - (cb1/(cw1*k2*fw_star))*(ft2 + (1.0 - ft2)*fv2))/(fv1 * max(1.0e-10,1.0-ft2));
3057  psi_2 = min(100.0,psi_2);
3058 
3059  switch(kindHybridRANSLES){
3060  case SA_DES:
3061  /*--- Original Detached Eddy Simulation (DES97)
3062  Spalart
3063  1997
3064  ---*/
3065 
3066  maxDelta = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetMaxLength();
3067  distDES = constDES * maxDelta;
3068  lengthScale = min(distDES,wallDistance);
3069 
3070  break;
3071 
3072  case SA_DDES:
3073  /*--- A New Version of Detached-eddy Simulation, Resistant to Ambiguous Grid Densities.
3074  Spalart et al.
3075  Theoretical and Computational Fluid Dynamics - 2006
3076  ---*/
3077 
3078  maxDelta = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetMaxLength();
3079 
3080  r_d = (kinematicViscosityTurb+kinematicViscosity)/(uijuij*k2*pow(wallDistance, 2.0));
3081  f_d = 1.0-tanh(pow(8.0*r_d,3.0));
3082 
3083  distDES = constDES * maxDelta;
3084  lengthScale = wallDistance-f_d*max(0.0,(wallDistance-distDES));
3085 
3086  break;
3087  case SA_ZDES:
3088  /*--- Recent improvements in the Zonal Detached Eddy Simulation (ZDES) formulation.
3089  Deck
3090  Theoretical and Computational Fluid Dynamics - 2012
3091  ---*/
3092 
3093  for (iNeigh = 0; iNeigh < nNeigh; iNeigh++){
3094  jPoint = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNeigh);
3095  coord_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord();
3096  for ( iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++){
3097  deltaAux = abs(coord_j[iDim] - coord_i[iDim]);
3098  delta[iDim] = max(delta[iDim], deltaAux);
3099  }
3100  deltaDDES = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetMaxLength();
3101  }
3102 
3103  omega = sqrt(vorticity[0]*vorticity[0] +
3104  vorticity[1]*vorticity[1] +
3105  vorticity[2]*vorticity[2]);
3106 
3107  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 3; iDim++){
3108  ratioOmega[iDim] = vorticity[iDim]/omega;
3109  }
3110 
3111  maxDelta = sqrt(pow(ratioOmega[0],2.0)*delta[1]*delta[2] +
3112  pow(ratioOmega[1],2.0)*delta[0]*delta[2] +
3113  pow(ratioOmega[2],2.0)*delta[0]*delta[1]);
3114 
3115  r_d = (kinematicViscosityTurb+kinematicViscosity)/(uijuij*k2*pow(wallDistance, 2.0));
3116  f_d = 1.0-tanh(pow(8.0*r_d,3.0));
3117 
3118  if (f_d < 0.99){
3119  maxDelta = deltaDDES;
3120  }
3121 
3122  distDES = constDES * maxDelta;
3123  lengthScale = wallDistance-f_d*max(0.0,(wallDistance-distDES));
3124 
3125  break;
3126 
3127  case SA_EDDES:
3128 
3129  /*--- An Enhanced Version of DES with Rapid Transition from RANS to LES in Separated Flows.
3130  Shur et al.
3131  Flow Turbulence Combust - 2015
3132  ---*/
3133 
3134  vortexTiltingMeasure = nodes->GetVortex_Tilting(iPoint);
3135 
3136  omega = sqrt(vorticity[0]*vorticity[0] +
3137  vorticity[1]*vorticity[1] +
3138  vorticity[2]*vorticity[2]);
3139 
3140  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 3; iDim++){
3141  ratioOmega[iDim] = vorticity[iDim]/omega;
3142  }
3143 
3144  ln_max = 0.0;
3145  deltaDDES = 0.0;
3146  for (iNeigh = 0;iNeigh < nNeigh; iNeigh++){
3147  jPoint = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNeigh);
3148  coord_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord();
3149  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++){
3150  delta[iDim] = fabs(coord_j[iDim] - coord_i[iDim]);
3151  }
3152  deltaDDES = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetMaxLength();
3153  ln[0] = delta[1]*ratioOmega[2] - delta[2]*ratioOmega[1];
3154  ln[1] = delta[2]*ratioOmega[0] - delta[0]*ratioOmega[2];
3155  ln[2] = delta[0]*ratioOmega[1] - delta[1]*ratioOmega[0];
3156  aux_ln = sqrt(ln[0]*ln[0] + ln[1]*ln[1] + ln[2]*ln[2]);
3157  ln_max = max(ln_max,aux_ln);
3158  vortexTiltingMeasure += nodes->GetVortex_Tilting(jPoint);
3159  }
3160 
3161  vortexTiltingMeasure = (vortexTiltingMeasure/fabs(nNeigh + 1.0));
3162 
3163  f_kh = max(f_min, min(f_max, f_min + ((f_max - f_min)/(a2 - a1)) * (vortexTiltingMeasure - a1)));
3164 
3165  r_d = (kinematicViscosityTurb+kinematicViscosity)/(uijuij*k2*pow(wallDistance, 2.0));
3166  f_d = 1.0-tanh(pow(8.0*r_d,3.0));
3167 
3168  maxDelta = (ln_max/sqrt(3.0)) * f_kh;
3169  if (f_d < 0.999){
3170  maxDelta = deltaDDES;
3171  }
3172 
3173  distDES = constDES * maxDelta;
3174  lengthScale=wallDistance-f_d*max(0.0,(wallDistance-distDES));
3175 
3176  break;
3177 
3178  }
3179 
3180  nodes->SetDES_LengthScale(iPoint,lengthScale);
3181 
3182  }
3183 }

3308  Residual_RMS = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_RMS[iVar] = 0.0;
3309  Residual_i = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_i[iVar] = 0.0;
3310  Residual_j = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_j[iVar] = 0.0;
3311  Residual_Max = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_Max[iVar] = 0.0;
3312 
3313  /*--- Define some structures for locating max residuals ---*/
3314 
3315  Point_Max = new unsigned long[nVar];
3316  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Point_Max[iVar] = 0;
3317  Point_Max_Coord = new su2double*[nVar];
3318  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3319  Point_Max_Coord[iVar] = new su2double[nDim];
3320  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Point_Max_Coord[iVar][iDim] = 0.0;
3321  }
3322 
3323  /*--- Define some auxiliary vector related with the solution ---*/
3324 
3325  Solution = new su2double[nVar];
3326  Solution_i = new su2double[nVar]; Solution_j = new su2double[nVar];
3327 
3328  /*--- Define some auxiliary vector related with the geometry ---*/
3329 
3330  Vector_i = new su2double[nDim]; Vector_j = new su2double[nDim];
3331 
3332  /*--- Define some auxiliary vector related with the flow solution ---*/
3333 
3334  FlowPrimVar_i = new su2double [nDim+9]; FlowPrimVar_j = new su2double [nDim+9];
3335 
3336  /*--- Jacobians and vector structures for implicit computations ---*/
3337 
3338  Jacobian_i = new su2double* [nVar];
3339  Jacobian_j = new su2double* [nVar];
3340  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3341  Jacobian_i[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
3342  Jacobian_j[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
3343  }
3344 
3345  /*--- Initialization of the structure of the whole Jacobian ---*/
3346 
3347  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Initialize Jacobian structure (SST model)." << endl;
3348  Jacobian.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nVar, nVar, true, geometry, config);
3349 
3350  if (config->GetKind_Linear_Solver_Prec() == LINELET) {
3351  nLineLets = Jacobian.BuildLineletPreconditioner(geometry, config);
3352  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Compute linelet structure. " << nLineLets << " elements in each line (average)." << endl;
3353  }
3354 
3355  LinSysSol.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nVar, 0.0);
3356  LinSysRes.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nVar, 0.0);
3357 
3358  /*--- Initialize the BGS residuals in multizone problems. ---*/
3359  if (multizone){
3360  Residual_BGS = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_BGS[iVar] = 0.0;
3361  Residual_Max_BGS = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_Max_BGS[iVar] = 0.0;
3362 
3363  /*--- Define some structures for locating max residuals ---*/
3364 
3365  Point_Max_BGS = new unsigned long[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Point_Max_BGS[iVar] = 0;
3366  Point_Max_Coord_BGS = new su2double*[nVar];
3367  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3368  Point_Max_Coord_BGS[iVar] = new su2double[nDim];
3369  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Point_Max_Coord_BGS[iVar][iDim] = 0.0;
3370  }
3371  }
3372 
3373  }
3374 
3375  /*--- Computation of gradients by least squares ---*/
3376 
3377  if (config->GetLeastSquaresRequired()) {
3378  /*--- S matrix := inv(R)*traspose(inv(R)) ---*/
3379  Smatrix = new su2double* [nDim];
3380  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3381  Smatrix[iDim] = new su2double [nDim];
3382  /*--- c vector := transpose(WA)*(Wb) ---*/
3383  Cvector = new su2double* [nVar];
3384  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
3385  Cvector[iVar] = new su2double [nDim];
3386  }
3387 
3388  /*--- Initialize value for model constants ---*/
3389  constants = new su2double[10];
3390  constants[0] = 0.85; //sigma_k1
3391  constants[1] = 1.0; //sigma_k2
3392  constants[2] = 0.5; //sigma_om1
3393  constants[3] = 0.856; //sigma_om2
3394  constants[4] = 0.075; //beta_1
3395  constants[5] = 0.0828; //beta_2
3396  constants[6] = 0.09; //betaStar
3397  constants[7] = 0.31; //a1
3398  constants[8] = constants[4]/constants[6] - constants[2]*0.41*0.41/sqrt(constants[6]); //alfa_1
3399  constants[9] = constants[5]/constants[6] - constants[3]*0.41*0.41/sqrt(constants[6]); //alfa_2
3400 
3401  /*--- Initialize lower and upper limits---*/
3402  lowerlimit = new su2double[nVar];
3403  upperlimit = new su2double[nVar];
3404 
3405  lowerlimit[0] = 1.0e-10;
3406  upperlimit[0] = 1.0e10;
3407 
3408  lowerlimit[1] = 1.0e-4;
3409  upperlimit[1] = 1.0e15;
3410 
3411  /*--- Far-field flow state quantities and initialization. ---*/
3412  su2double rhoInf, *VelInf, muLamInf, Intensity, viscRatio, muT_Inf;
3413 
3414  rhoInf = config->GetDensity_FreeStreamND();
3415  VelInf = config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND();
3416  muLamInf = config->GetViscosity_FreeStreamND();
3417  Intensity = config->GetTurbulenceIntensity_FreeStream();
3418  viscRatio = config->GetTurb2LamViscRatio_FreeStream();
3419 
3420  su2double VelMag = 0;
3421  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3422  VelMag += VelInf[iDim]*VelInf[iDim];
3423  VelMag = sqrt(VelMag);
3424 
3425  kine_Inf = 3.0/2.0*(VelMag*VelMag*Intensity*Intensity);
3426  omega_Inf = rhoInf*kine_Inf/(muLamInf*viscRatio);
3427 
3428  /*--- Eddy viscosity, initialized without stress limiter at the infinity ---*/
3429  muT_Inf = rhoInf*kine_Inf/omega_Inf;
3430 
3431  /*--- Initialize the solution to the far-field state everywhere. ---*/
3432 
3433  nodes = new CTurbSSTVariable(kine_Inf, omega_Inf, muT_Inf, nPoint, nDim, nVar, constants, config);
3434  SetBaseClassPointerToNodes();
3435 
3436  /*--- MPI solution ---*/
3437 
3438  InitiateComms(geometry, config, SOLUTION_EDDY);
3439  CompleteComms(geometry, config, SOLUTION_EDDY);
3440 
3441  /*--- Initializate quantities for SlidingMesh Interface ---*/
3442 
3443  unsigned long iMarker;
3444 
3445  SlidingState = new su2double*** [nMarker];
3446  SlidingStateNodes = new int* [nMarker];
3447 
3448  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
3449 
3450  SlidingState[iMarker] = NULL;
3451  SlidingStateNodes[iMarker] = NULL;
3452 
3453  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == FLUID_INTERFACE){
3454 
3455  SlidingState[iMarker] = new su2double**[geometry->GetnVertex(iMarker)];
3456  SlidingStateNodes[iMarker] = new int [geometry->GetnVertex(iMarker)];
3457 
3458  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnVertex(iMarker); iPoint++){
3459  SlidingState[iMarker][iPoint] = new su2double*[nPrimVar+1];
3460 
3461  SlidingStateNodes[iMarker][iPoint] = 0;
3462  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nPrimVar+1; iVar++)
3463  SlidingState[iMarker][iPoint][iVar] = NULL;
3464  }
3465 
3466  }
3467  }
3468 
3469  /*-- Allocation of inlets has to happen in derived classes (not CTurbSolver),
3470  due to arbitrary number of turbulence variables ---*/
3471 
3472  Inlet_TurbVars = new su2double**[nMarker];
3473  for (unsigned long iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3474  Inlet_TurbVars[iMarker] = new su2double*[nVertex[iMarker]];
3475  for(unsigned long iVertex=0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++){
3476  Inlet_TurbVars[iMarker][iVertex] = new su2double[nVar];
3477  Inlet_TurbVars[iMarker][iVertex][0] = kine_Inf;
3478  Inlet_TurbVars[iMarker][iVertex][1] = omega_Inf;
3479  }
3480  }
3481 
3482  /*--- The turbulence models are always solved implicitly, so set the
3483  implicit flag in case we have periodic BCs. ---*/
3484 
3485  SetImplicitPeriodic(true);
3486 
3487  /* Store the initial CFL number for all grid points. */
3488 
3489  const su2double CFL = config->GetCFL(MGLevel);
3490  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
3491  nodes->SetLocalCFL(iPoint, CFL);
3492  }
3493  Min_CFL_Local = CFL;
3494  Max_CFL_Local = CFL;
3495  Avg_CFL_Local = CFL;
3496 
3497  /*--- Add the solver name (max 8 characters) ---*/
3498  SolverName = "K-W SST";
3499 
3500 }
3501 
3502 CTurbSSTSolver::~CTurbSSTSolver(void) {
3503 
3504  if (constants != NULL) delete [] constants;
3505 
3506  unsigned long iMarker, iVertex;
3507  unsigned short iVar;
3508 
3509  if ( SlidingState != NULL ) {
3510  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3511  if ( SlidingState[iMarker] != NULL ) {
3512  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++)
3513  if ( SlidingState[iMarker][iVertex] != NULL ){
3514  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nPrimVar+1; iVar++)
3515  delete [] SlidingState[iMarker][iVertex][iVar];
3516  delete [] SlidingState[iMarker][iVertex];
3517  }
3518  delete [] SlidingState[iMarker];
3519  }
3520  }
3521  delete [] SlidingState;
3522  }
3523 
3524  if ( SlidingStateNodes != NULL ){
3525  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
3526  if (SlidingStateNodes[iMarker] != NULL)
3527  delete [] SlidingStateNodes[iMarker];
3528  }
3529  delete [] SlidingStateNodes;
3530  }
3531 
3532 }

3534 void CTurbSSTSolver::Preprocessing(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh, unsigned short iRKStep, unsigned short RunTime_EqSystem, bool Output) {
3535 
3536  unsigned long iPoint;
3537 
3538  bool limiter_turb = (config->GetKind_SlopeLimit_Turb() != NO_LIMITER) && (config->GetInnerIter() <= config->GetLimiterIter());
3539 
3540 
3541  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint ++) {
3542 
3543  /*--- Initialize the residual vector ---*/
3544 
3545  LinSysRes.SetBlock_Zero(iPoint);
3546 
3547  }
3548 
3549  /*--- Initialize the Jacobian matrices ---*/
3550 
3551  Jacobian.SetValZero();
3552 
3553  /*--- Upwind second order reconstruction and gradients ---*/
3554 
3555  if (config->GetReconstructionGradientRequired()) {
3556  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method_Recon() == GREEN_GAUSS)
3557  SetSolution_Gradient_GG(geometry, config, true);
3558  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method_Recon() == LEAST_SQUARES)
3559  SetSolution_Gradient_LS(geometry, config, true);
3560  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method_Recon() == WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES)
3561  SetSolution_Gradient_LS(geometry, config, true);
3562  }
3563  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == GREEN_GAUSS) SetSolution_Gradient_GG(geometry, config);
3564  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES) SetSolution_Gradient_LS(geometry, config);
3565 
3566  if (limiter_turb) SetSolution_Limiter(geometry, config);
3567 
3568 }

3570 void CTurbSSTSolver::Postprocessing(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) {
3571  su2double rho = 0.0, mu = 0.0, dist, omega, kine, F2, muT, zeta;
3572  su2double a1 = constants[7];
3573  unsigned long iPoint;
3574 
3575  /*--- Compute mean flow and turbulence gradients ---*/
3576 
3577  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == GREEN_GAUSS) {
3578  SetSolution_Gradient_GG(geometry, config);
3579  }
3580  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES) {
3581  SetSolution_Gradient_LS(geometry, config);
3582  }
3583 
3584  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint ++) {
3585 
3586  /*--- Compute blending functions and cross diffusion ---*/
3587 
3588  rho = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(iPoint);
3589  mu = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetLaminarViscosity(iPoint);
3590 
3591  dist = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetWall_Distance();
3592 
3593  su2double *Vorticity = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetVorticity(iPoint);
3594  su2double VorticityMag = sqrt(Vorticity[0]*Vorticity[0] +
3595  Vorticity[1]*Vorticity[1] +
3596  Vorticity[2]*Vorticity[2]);
3597 
3598  nodes->SetBlendingFunc(iPoint,mu, dist, rho);
3599 
3600  F2 = nodes->GetF2blending(iPoint);
3601 
3602  /*--- Compute the eddy viscosity ---*/
3603 
3604  kine = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,0);
3605  omega = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,1);
3606  zeta = min(1.0/omega, a1/(VorticityMag*F2));
3607  muT = max(rho*kine*zeta,0.0);
3608  nodes->SetmuT(iPoint,muT);
3609 
3610  }
3611 
3612 }

3614 void CTurbSSTSolver::Source_Residual(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics, CNumerics *second_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) {
3615 
3616  unsigned long iPoint;
3617 
3618  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
3619 
3620  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
3621 
3622  numerics->SetPrimitive(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint), NULL);
3623 
3624  /*--- Gradient of the primitive and conservative variables ---*/
3625 
3626  numerics->SetPrimVarGradient(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetGradient_Primitive(iPoint), NULL);
3627 
3628  /*--- Turbulent variables w/o reconstruction, and its gradient ---*/
3629 
3630  numerics->SetTurbVar(nodes->GetSolution(iPoint), NULL);
3631  numerics->SetTurbVarGradient(nodes->GetGradient(iPoint), NULL);
3632 
3633  /*--- Set volume ---*/
3634 
3635  numerics->SetVolume(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume());
3636 
3637  /*--- Set distance to the surface ---*/
3638 
3639  numerics->SetDistance(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetWall_Distance(), 0.0);
3640 
3641  /*--- Menter's first blending function ---*/
3642 
3643  numerics->SetF1blending(nodes->GetF1blending(iPoint),0.0);
3644 
3645  /*--- Menter's second blending function ---*/
3646 
3647  numerics->SetF2blending(nodes->GetF2blending(iPoint),0.0);
3648 
3649  /*--- Set vorticity and strain rate magnitude ---*/
3650 
3651  numerics->SetVorticity(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetVorticity(iPoint), NULL);
3652 
3653  numerics->SetStrainMag(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetStrainMag(iPoint), 0.0);
3654 
3655  /*--- Cross diffusion ---*/
3656 
3657  numerics->SetCrossDiff(nodes->GetCrossDiff(iPoint),0.0);
3658 
3659  /*--- Compute the source term ---*/
3660 
3661  numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, NULL, config);
3662 
3663  /*--- Subtract residual and the Jacobian ---*/
3664 
3665  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual);
3666  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
3667 
3668  }
3669 
3670 }

3677 void CTurbSSTSolver::BC_HeatFlux_Wall(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
3678 
3679  unsigned long iPoint, jPoint, iVertex, total_index;
3680  unsigned short iDim, iVar;
3681  su2double distance, density = 0.0, laminar_viscosity = 0.0, beta_1;
3682 
3683  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
3684  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3685 
3686  /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e, not a halo node) ---*/
3687  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3688 
3689  /*--- distance to closest neighbor ---*/
3690  jPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
3691  distance = 0.0;
3692  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3693  distance += (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim) - geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord(iDim))*
3694  (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim) - geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord(iDim));
3695  }
3696  distance = sqrt(distance);
3697 
3698  /*--- Set wall values ---*/
3699 
3700  density = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetDensity(jPoint);
3701  laminar_viscosity = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetLaminarViscosity(jPoint);
3702 
3703  beta_1 = constants[4];
3704 
3705  Solution[0] = 0.0;
3706  Solution[1] = 60.0*laminar_viscosity/(density*beta_1*distance*distance);
3707 
3708  /*--- Set the solution values and zero the residual ---*/
3709  nodes->SetSolution_Old(iPoint,Solution);
3710  nodes->SetSolution(iPoint,Solution);
3711  LinSysRes.SetBlock_Zero(iPoint);
3712 
3713  /*--- Change rows of the Jacobian (includes 1 in the diagonal) ---*/
3714  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3715  total_index = iPoint*nVar+iVar;
3716  Jacobian.DeleteValsRowi(total_index);
3717  }
3718 
3719  }
3720  }
3721 
3722 }

3772 void CTurbSSTSolver::BC_Far_Field(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
3773 
3774  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex;
3775  su2double *Normal, *V_infty, *V_domain;
3776  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
3777 
3778  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
3779 
3780  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
3781 
3782  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3783 
3784  /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e, not a halo node) ---*/
3785 
3786  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3787 
3788  /*--- Allocate the value at the infinity ---*/
3789 
3790  V_infty = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
3791 
3792  /*--- Retrieve solution at the farfield boundary node ---*/
3793 
3794  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint);
3795 
3796  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_infty);
3797 
3798  /*--- Set turbulent variable at the wall, and at infinity ---*/
3799 
3800  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
3801  Solution_i[iVar] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,iVar);
3802 
3803  Solution_j[0] = kine_Inf;
3804  Solution_j[1] = omega_Inf;
3805 
3806  conv_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
3807 
3808  /*--- Set Normal (it is necessary to change the sign) ---*/
3809 
3810  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
3811  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3812  Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
3813  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
3814 
3815  /*--- Grid Movement ---*/
3816 
3817  if (dynamic_grid)
3818  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
3819 
3820  /*--- Compute residuals and Jacobians ---*/
3821 
3822  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
3823 
3824  /*--- Add residuals and Jacobians ---*/
3825 
3826  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
3827  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
3828 
3829  }
3830  }
3831 
3832  delete [] Normal;
3833 
3834 }

3836 void CTurbSSTSolver::BC_Inlet(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config,
3837  unsigned short val_marker) {
3838 
3839  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
3840  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
3841  su2double *V_inlet, *V_domain, *Normal;
3842 
3843  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
3844 
3845  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(val_marker);
3846 
3847  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
3848 
3849  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
3850 
3851  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3852 
3853  /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e., not a halo node) ---*/
3854 
3855  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3856 
3857  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
3858 
3859  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
3860  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
3861 
3862  /*--- Allocate the value at the inlet ---*/
3863 
3864  V_inlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
3865 
3866  /*--- Retrieve solution at the farfield boundary node ---*/
3867 
3868  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint);
3869 
3870  /*--- Set various quantities in the solver class ---*/
3871 
3872  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
3873 
3874  /*--- Set the turbulent variable states. Use free-stream SST
3875  values for the turbulent state at the inflow. ---*/
3876 
3877  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
3878  Solution_i[iVar] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,iVar);
3879 
3880  /*--- Load the inlet turbulence variables (uniform by default). ---*/
3881 
3882  Solution_j[0] = Inlet_TurbVars[val_marker][iVertex][0];
3883  Solution_j[1] = Inlet_TurbVars[val_marker][iVertex][1];
3884 
3885  conv_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
3886 
3887  /*--- Set various other quantities in the solver class ---*/
3888 
3889  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
3890 
3891  if (dynamic_grid)
3892  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(),
3893  geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
3894 
3895  /*--- Compute the residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
3896 
3897  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
3898  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
3899 
3900  /*--- Jacobian contribution for implicit integration ---*/
3901 
3902  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
3903

3905  //
3906  // visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());
3907  // visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
3908  //
3909  // /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
3910  //
3911  // visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
3912  //
3913  // /*--- Turbulent variables w/o reconstruction, and its gradients ---*/
3914  //
3915  // visc_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
3916  // visc_numerics->SetTurbVarGradient(node[iPoint]->GetGradient(), node[iPoint]->GetGradient());
3917  //

3919  //

3923  //

3941 void CTurbSSTSolver::BC_Outlet(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
3942 
3943  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex;
3944  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
3945  su2double *V_outlet, *V_domain, *Normal;
3946 
3947  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
3948 
3949  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
3950 
3951  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
3952  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3953 
3954  /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e., not a halo node) ---*/
3955 
3956  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3957 
3958  /*--- Allocate the value at the outlet ---*/
3959 
3960  V_outlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
3961

3964  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint);
3965 
3966  /*--- Set various quantities in the solver class ---*/
3967 
3968  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_outlet);
3969 
3970  /*--- Set the turbulent variables. Here we use a Neumann BC such
3971  that the turbulent variable is copied from the interior of the
3972  domain to the outlet before computing the residual.
3973  Solution_i --> TurbVar_internal,
3974  Solution_j --> TurbVar_outlet ---*/

3977  Solution_i[iVar] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,iVar);
3978  Solution_j[iVar] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,iVar);
3979  }
3980  conv_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);

3988 
3989  if (dynamic_grid)
3990  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(),
3991  geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
3992 
3993  /*--- Compute the residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
3994 
3995  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
3996  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
3997 
3998  /*--- Jacobian contribution for implicit integration ---*/
3999 
4000  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
4001

4003 //
4004 // visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());

4006 //

4008 //
4009 // visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_outlet);
4010 //

4012 //

4038 void CTurbSSTSolver::BC_Inlet_MixingPlane(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config,
4039  unsigned short val_marker) {
4040 
4041  unsigned short iVar, iSpan, iDim;
4042  unsigned long oldVertex, iPoint, Point_Normal;
4043  long iVertex;
4044  su2double *V_inlet, *V_domain, *Normal;
4045  su2double extAverageKine, extAverageOmega;
4046  unsigned short nSpanWiseSections = config->GetnSpanWiseSections();
4047 
4048  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
4049 
4050  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(val_marker);
4051 
4052  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
4053  for (iSpan= 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections ; iSpan++){
4054  extAverageKine = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetExtAverageKine(val_marker, iSpan);
4055  extAverageOmega = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetExtAverageOmega(val_marker, iSpan);
4056 
4057 
4058  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
4059 
4060  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertexSpan[val_marker][iSpan]; iVertex++) {
4061 
4062  /*--- find the node related to the vertex ---*/
4063  iPoint = geometry->turbovertex[val_marker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetNode();
4064 
4065  /*--- using the other vertex information for retrieving some information ---*/
4066  oldVertex = geometry->turbovertex[val_marker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetOldVertex();
4067 
4068  /*--- Index of the closest interior node ---*/
4069  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][oldVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
4070 
4071  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
4072 
4073  geometry->vertex[val_marker][oldVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
4074  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
4075 
4076  /*--- Allocate the value at the inlet ---*/
4077  V_inlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, oldVertex);
4078 
4079  /*--- Retrieve solution at the farfield boundary node ---*/
4080 
4081  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint);
4082 
4083  /*--- Set various quantities in the solver class ---*/
4084 
4085  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
4086 
4087  /*--- Set the turbulent variable states (prescribed for an inflow) ---*/
4088 
4089  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
4090  Solution_i[iVar] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,iVar);
4091 
4092  Solution_j[0]= extAverageKine;
4093  Solution_j[1]= extAverageOmega;
4094 
4095  conv_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
4096 
4097  /*--- Set various other quantities in the solver class ---*/
4098  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4099 
4100  if (dynamic_grid)
4101  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(),
4102  geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
4103 
4104  /*--- Compute the residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
4105  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
4106  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
4107 
4108  /*--- Jacobian contribution for implicit integration ---*/
4109  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
4110 
4111  /*--- Viscous contribution ---*/
4112  visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());
4113  visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4114 
4115  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
4116  visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
4117 
4118  /*--- Turbulent variables w/o reconstruction, and its gradients ---*/
4119  visc_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
4120  visc_numerics->SetTurbVarGradient(nodes->GetGradient(iPoint), nodes->GetGradient(iPoint));
4121 
4122  /*--- Menter's first blending function ---*/
4123  visc_numerics->SetF1blending(nodes->GetF1blending(iPoint), nodes->GetF1blending(iPoint));
4124 
4125  /*--- Compute residual, and Jacobians ---*/
4126  visc_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
4127 
4128  /*--- Subtract residual, and update Jacobians ---*/
4129  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual);
4130  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
4131 
4132  }
4133  }
4134 
4135  /*--- Free locally allocated memory ---*/
4136  delete[] Normal;
4137 
4138 }

4140 void CTurbSSTSolver::BC_Inlet_Turbo(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config,
4141  unsigned short val_marker) {
4142 
4143  unsigned short iVar, iSpan, iDim;
4144  unsigned long oldVertex, iPoint, Point_Normal;
4145  long iVertex;
4146  su2double *V_inlet, *V_domain, *Normal;
4147  unsigned short nSpanWiseSections = config->GetnSpanWiseSections();
4148 
4149  /*--- Quantities for computing the kine and omega to impose at the inlet boundary. ---*/
4150  su2double rho, pressure, *Vel, VelMag, muLam, Intensity, viscRatio, kine_b, omega_b, kine;
4151  CFluidModel *FluidModel;
4152 
4153  FluidModel = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetFluidModel();
4154  Intensity = config->GetTurbulenceIntensity_FreeStream();
4155  viscRatio = config->GetTurb2LamViscRatio_FreeStream();
4156 
4157  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
4158  Vel = new su2double[nDim];
4159 
4160  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(val_marker);
4161 
4162 
4163  for (iSpan= 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections ; iSpan++){
4164 
4165  /*--- Compute the inflow kine and omega using the span wise averge quntities---*/
4166  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4167  Vel[iDim] = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetAverageTurboVelocity(val_marker, iSpan)[iDim];
4168 
4169  rho = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetAverageDensity(val_marker, iSpan);
4170  pressure = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetAveragePressure(val_marker, iSpan);
4171  kine = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetAverageKine(val_marker, iSpan);
4172 
4173  FluidModel->SetTDState_Prho(pressure, rho);
4174  muLam = FluidModel->GetLaminarViscosity();
4175 
4176  VelMag = 0;
4177  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4178  VelMag += Vel[iDim]*Vel[iDim];
4179  VelMag = sqrt(VelMag);
4180 
4181  kine_b = 3.0/2.0*(VelMag*VelMag*Intensity*Intensity);
4182  omega_b = rho*kine/(muLam*viscRatio);
4183 
4184  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
4185  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertexSpan[val_marker][iSpan]; iVertex++) {
4186 
4187  /*--- find the node related to the vertex ---*/
4188  iPoint = geometry->turbovertex[val_marker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetNode();
4189 
4190  /*--- using the other vertex information for retrieving some information ---*/
4191  oldVertex = geometry->turbovertex[val_marker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetOldVertex();
4192 
4193  /*--- Index of the closest interior node ---*/
4194  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][oldVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
4195 
4196  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
4197 
4198  geometry->vertex[val_marker][oldVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
4199  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
4200 
4201  /*--- Allocate the value at the inlet ---*/
4202  V_inlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, oldVertex);
4203 
4204  /*--- Retrieve solution at the farfield boundary node ---*/
4205 
4206  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint);
4207 
4208  /*--- Set various quantities in the solver class ---*/
4209 
4210  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
4211 
4212  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
4213  Solution_i[iVar] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,iVar);
4214 
4215  /*--- Set the turbulent variable states. Use average span-wise values
4216  values for the turbulent state at the inflow. ---*/
4217 
4218  Solution_j[0]= kine_b;
4219  Solution_j[1]= omega_b;
4220 
4221  conv_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
4222 
4223  /*--- Set various other quantities in the solver class ---*/
4224  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4225 
4226  if (dynamic_grid)
4227  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(),
4228  geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
4229 
4230  /*--- Compute the residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
4231  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
4232  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
4233 
4234  /*--- Jacobian contribution for implicit integration ---*/
4235  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
4236 
4237  /*--- Viscous contribution ---*/
4238  visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());
4239  visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4240 
4241  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
4242  visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_inlet);
4243 
4244  /*--- Turbulent variables w/o reconstruction, and its gradients ---*/
4245  visc_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
4246  visc_numerics->SetTurbVarGradient(nodes->GetGradient(iPoint), nodes->GetGradient(iPoint));
4247 
4248  /*--- Menter's first blending function ---*/
4249  visc_numerics->SetF1blending(nodes->GetF1blending(iPoint), nodes->GetF1blending(iPoint));
4250 
4251  /*--- Compute residual, and Jacobians ---*/
4252  visc_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
4253 
4254  /*--- Subtract residual, and update Jacobians ---*/
4255  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual);
4256  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
4257 
4258  }
4259  }
4260 
4261  /*--- Free locally allocated memory ---*/
4262  delete[] Normal;
4263  delete[] Vel;
4264 
4265 }

4268 void CTurbSSTSolver::BC_Fluid_Interface(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics,
4269  CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config){
4270 
4271  unsigned long iVertex, jVertex, iPoint, Point_Normal = 0;
4272  unsigned short iDim, iVar, iMarker;
4273 
4274  unsigned short nPrimVar = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetnPrimVar();
4275  su2double *Normal = new su2double[nDim];
4276  su2double *PrimVar_i = new su2double[nPrimVar];
4277  su2double *PrimVar_j = new su2double[nPrimVar];
4278  su2double *tmp_residual = new su2double[nVar];
4279 
4280  unsigned long nDonorVertex;
4281  su2double weight;
4282 
4283  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
4284 
4285  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == FLUID_INTERFACE) {
4286 
4287  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
4288 
4289  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4290  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
4291 
4292  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
4293 
4294  nDonorVertex = GetnSlidingStates(iMarker, iVertex);
4295 
4296  /*--- Initialize Residual, this will serve to accumulate the average ---*/
4297 
4298  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
4299  Residual[iVar] = 0.0;
4300 
4301  /*--- Loop over the nDonorVertexes and compute the averaged flux ---*/
4302 
4303  for (jVertex = 0; jVertex < nDonorVertex; jVertex++){
4304 
4305  geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
4306  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
4307 
4308  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nPrimVar; iVar++) {
4309  PrimVar_i[iVar] = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetNodes()->GetPrimitive(iPoint,iVar);
4310  PrimVar_j[iVar] = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetSlidingState(iMarker, iVertex, iVar, jVertex);
4311  }
4312 
4313  /*--- Get the weight computed in the interpolator class for the j-th donor vertex ---*/
4314 
4315  weight = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetSlidingState(iMarker, iVertex, nPrimVar, jVertex);
4316 
4317  /*--- Set primitive variables ---*/
4318 
4319  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive( PrimVar_i, PrimVar_j );
4320 
4321  /*--- Set the turbulent variable states ---*/
4322  Solution_i[0] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,0);
4323  Solution_i[1] = nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,1);
4324 
4325  Solution_j[0] = GetSlidingState(iMarker, iVertex, 0, jVertex);
4326  Solution_j[1] = GetSlidingState(iMarker, iVertex, 1, jVertex);
4327 
4328  conv_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
4329 
4330  /*--- Set the normal vector ---*/
4331 
4332  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4333 
4334  if (dynamic_grid)
4335  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
4336 
4337  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(tmp_residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
4338 
4339  /*--- Accumulate the residuals to compute the average ---*/
4340 
4341  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
4342  Residual[iVar] += weight*tmp_residual[iVar];
4343  }
4344 
4345  /*--- Add Residuals and Jacobians ---*/
4346 
4347  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
4348 
4349  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
4350 
4351  /*--- Set the normal vector and the coordinates ---*/
4352 
4353  visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4354  visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());
4355 
4356  /*--- Primitive variables, and gradient ---*/
4357 
4358  visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(PrimVar_i, PrimVar_j);
4359  // visc_numerics->SetPrimVarGradient(node[iPoint]->GetGradient_Primitive(), node[iPoint]->GetGradient_Primitive());
4360 
4361  /*--- Turbulent variables and its gradients ---*/
4362 
4363  visc_numerics->SetTurbVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
4364  visc_numerics->SetTurbVarGradient(nodes->GetGradient(iPoint), nodes->GetGradient(iPoint));
4365 
4366  /*--- Compute and update residual ---*/
4367 
4368  visc_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, Jacobian_j, config);
4369 
4370  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual);
4371 
4372  /*--- Jacobian contribution for implicit integration ---*/
4373 
4374  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
4375 
4376  }
4377  }
4378  }
4379  }
4380 
4381  /*--- Free locally allocated memory ---*/
4382 
4383  delete [] tmp_residual;
4384  delete [] Normal;
4385  delete [] PrimVar_i;
4386  delete [] PrimVar_j;
4387 
4388 }

4394 void CTurbSSTSolver::SetInletAtVertex(su2double *val_inlet,
4395  unsigned short iMarker,
4396  unsigned long iVertex) {

4402 
4403 su2double CTurbSSTSolver::GetInletAtVertex(su2double *val_inlet,
4404  unsigned long val_inlet_point,
4405  unsigned short val_kind_marker,
4406  string val_marker,
4407  CGeometry *geometry,
4408  CConfig *config) {
4409 
4410  /*--- Local variables ---*/
4411 
4412  unsigned short iMarker, iDim;
4413  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex;
4414  su2double Area = 0.0;
4415  su2double Normal[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0};
4416 
4417  /*--- Alias positions within inlet file for readability ---*/
4418 
4419  if (val_kind_marker == INLET_FLOW) {
4420 
4421  unsigned short tke_position = nDim+2+nDim;
4422  unsigned short omega_position = nDim+2+nDim+1;
4423 
4424  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
4425  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == INLET_FLOW) &&
4426  (config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker) == val_marker)) {
4427 
4428  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++){
4429 
4430  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4431 
4432  if (iPoint == val_inlet_point) {
4433 
4434  /*-- Compute boundary face area for this vertex. ---*/
4435 
4436  geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
4437  Area = 0.0;
4438  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
4439  Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
4440  Area = sqrt(Area);
4441 
4442  /*--- Access and store the inlet variables for this vertex. ---*/
4443 
4444  val_inlet[tke_position] = Inlet_TurbVars[iMarker][iVertex][0];
4445  val_inlet[omega_position] = Inlet_TurbVars[iMarker][iVertex][1];
4446 
4447  /*--- Exit once we find the point. ---*/
4448 
4449  return Area;
4450 
4451  }
4452  }
4453  }
4454  }
4455 
4456  }
4457 
4458  /*--- If we don't find a match, then the child point is not on the
4459  current inlet boundary marker. Return zero area so this point does
4460  not contribute to the restriction operator and continue. ---*/
4461 
4462  return Area;
4463 
4464 }
4465 
4466 void CTurbSSTSolver::SetUniformInlet(CConfig* config, unsigned short iMarker) {
4467 
4468  for(unsigned long iVertex=0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++){
4469  Inlet_TurbVars[iMarker][iVertex][0] = kine_Inf;
4470  Inlet_TurbVars[iMarker][iVertex][1] = omega_Inf;
4471  }
4472 
4473 }
